title: Fullstack Developer - Node & React
description:
**Do you want to be a central part of product development for the biggest property platform in Sweden? Are you eager to join a self-propelled, cross-functional team that works data-driven with constant user feedback? Join us on our mission to help more people find a place to call home!**

**What’s in it for you?**
-------------------------

* **Innovative Approach:** Work with an experimental and iterative approach. Dare to explore uncharted territories, try something new, and surprise us all!
* **End-to-End Development:** Develop and maintain our products from idea to production.
* **Inclusive Culture:** Enjoy a friendly, inclusive, and caring company culture where transparency, work-life balance, and well-being are high priorities. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, or background.
* **️** **Lab Weeks:** Participate in recurring lab weeks—time for our developers to experiment, hack around, and evaluate creative ideas. Unleash Your Inner Mad Scientist—innovation starts here!
* **️ Autonomy:** Be part of a team that controls its own product decisions.

**Required Technical Skills:**
------------------------------

* **Javascript:** Proficiency in ES5, ES6+, and asynchronous programming.
* **Frameworks:** Experience with NestJS, Typescript, React, and Next.js.
* **Node.js:** In-depth knowledge of its ecosystem and frameworks.
* **APIs:** Experience with RESTful APIs and GraphQL implementation.
* **Database Management:** Proficiency with relational databases like PostgreSQL.
* **Cloud Services:** Familiarity with AWS, Docker, CircleCI, and how to deploy and scale Node.js services in the cloud.
* **Testing & Debugging:** Skills in testing and debugging Node.js applications.
  

**We also believe that you are experienced in:**
------------------------------------------------

* **Web Applications:** Designing, developing, and maintaining complex web-based Node.js applications in production environments.
* **Agile Methodologies:** Familiarity with Agile methodologies and tools (Scrum, Kanban, JIRA or similar).
* **Team Collaboration:** Experience working in team settings, especially in medium to large multicultural/global companies.
  

**We believe that this will ensure your success in this role:**

* **Problem Solver:** Excel at solving complex technical problems.
* **Good Communicator:** Have proficiency in written and verbal English.
* **Leadership Skills:** Have experience leading teams and mentoring junior developers.
* **Ownership:** Can take ownership of and drive initiatives from start to finish.
  

**What you will do:**
---------------------

* **Product Development:** Engage in all areas of product development—ideation, innovation, new development, iteration, and maintenance.
* **Team Collaboration:** Implement solutions with your team, deploying to production multiple times a day. Pair and mob programming are key parts of our knowledge sharing.
* **Node.js Journey:** Play a central role in our Node.js journey. While we have some services already running in production, this is just the beginning.
  

**Your career at Hemnet**  

With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.


Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.


With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.  

  

Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.

 **A Hybrid Way of Working**
  

Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.
company_description: At Hemnet we help people find their dream homes.

title: System Developer Senior
description:
**Role:**  

Taking lead how to develop, release, deploy and maintain customizations done on power platform.  

  

**Data & analytics developer accountabilities:**


Proven experience as a Fabric and Power BI Developer, with a focus on Data Factory, Notebooks, Lakehouses, and Power BI to design, develop, test, and implement customized analytics solutions to address specific business needs and enhance user experiences.


Collaborate with stakeholders and other product teams and their developers to understand requirements and translate them into efficient Power BI solutions.


Administer and manage the Power BI environment, including data modelling, customization, and configuration to maintain data integrity and accessibility.


Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for Microsoft Fabric applications, including technical specifications, user guides, and training materials.  

  

**Your Microsoft Fabric experience and requirements:**

* Proficient in Microsoft Fabric including data integration and modelling.
* Strong knowledge of Power BI for data visualization and reporting.
* Integration of Microsoft products
* Building proof of concept and demos
* Excellent communication skills
* Passion for technology


As a developer you should be comfortable working with Jira and Confluence for collaboration, follow-up and documentation.  

  

**Meritorious:**

  

* Technical architecture
* Development
* Data Integration
* Report development
* Visual Studio or VS.Code
* Data modelling
* Software documentation

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Utilization****:** 100**%**  

**Location:** Malmö  

**Period**: 01-01-2025-30-04-2025 with likely prolongation.  

**Last day to apply**: 17-12-2024  

We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: Experienced Full Stack Developer
description:
**Experienced Full Stack Developer**  

We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our team at Yazen Health, a company dedicated to revolutionizing obesity treatment with personalized, data-driven healthcare solutions. Our platform combines medical expertise, behavioral science, and advanced technology to help patients achieve sustainable weight loss and improved health outcomes. As a fast-growing startup, we're expanding our services across Europe, aiming to make a real impact on the lives of those affected by obesity.  

  

**About Yazen Health**  

  

At Yazen Health, our mission is rooted in compassion and care. We're a small, tight-knit team working across all areas — from patient apps and journal systems to content creation. Our work environment is dynamic, and we prioritize action over words. We want people who thrive on autonomy, proactivity, and collaboration. If you care deeply about patient outcomes, quality work, and innovative problem-solving, we'd love to have you on board.  

**What You’ll Do:**

  

* Work closely with our multi-disciplinary team (designers, developers, PMs, and data specialists) to develop full-stack solutions aligned with our mission.
* Build and maintain both front-end and back-end features of our applications, ensuring a seamless user experience.
* Collaborate with designers to implement precise, pixel-perfect interfaces.
* Lead code reviews, write tests, and ensure software quality through continuous improvement.
* Explore and implement new technologies to enhance development processes and efficiency.
* Troubleshoot software issues and proactively find solutions, keeping the patient experience in focus.
  

  

**Our Tech Stack:**

  

* **Front-end:** React, React Native, Expo
* **Back-end:** Firebase, Node.js
* **Tools & Platforms:** GitHub, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

  

  

**What We Value:**

  

* Passion for improving patient care through innovative healthcare solutions.
* Ability to adapt to a fast-paced, ever-changing environment.
* A proactive, hands-on approach, with the ability to ship fast and learn fast.
* Strong communication skills, especially in asynchronous environments.
* A collaborative mindset with experience in cross-functional teams.
* Comfort with data analysis to drive decisions and improvements.

  

  

**What We’re Looking For:**

  

* Experience working with React and Node.js (React Native and Firebase are a bonus).
* Strong understanding of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and CSS.
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
* Strong problem-solving abilities and adaptability.
* Ability to work autonomously, manage your time effectively, and prioritize tasks.
* Residency in Sweden is a plus, but not mandatory (valid work permit required).

  

  

**What Sets You Apart:**

  

* You thrive in dynamic environments where you can take initiative, contribute your ideas, and make a meaningful impact. You enjoy working collaboratively and appreciate the opportunity to grow while making quick, thoughtful decisions.
* You care about the quality of your work and the impact it has on others.
* You're eager to be part of a mission-driven team that’s improving lives through better healthcare.

  

  

**What We Offer:**

  

* A collaborative, mission-driven work environment where your input makes a real difference.
* Opportunities to work remotely, with a team that values flexibility and open communication.
* Continuous professional development, with access to cutting-edge tools and technologies.
* The chance to be a part of an innovative healthcare scale up and shape the future of obesity treatment.

  

  

**How to Apply:**  

  

Please upload your CV and share why you're excited about joining Yazen Health. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
**Vilka är Wint?**  

  

På Wint är vi fast beslutna att göra det superenkelt för våra kunder att driva företag genom att automatisera deras ekonomi- och löneadministration. Wint är en fullservicetjänst som ersätter den traditionella redovisningsbyrån. Vi hanterar hela bolagets ekonomi automatiskt för våra kunder, och när de använder Wint så får dem helt enkelt automatiserad bokföring i realtid.  

  

Vi är idag ett gäng på 100+ anställda i Göteborg. Här hittar du både ekonomer, utvecklare, projektledare, skatteexperter och customer success coordinators, som alla har samma mål; att trolla bort så mycket som möjligt av de måsten som följer med företagande, så att våra kunder får mer tid till det som är kul eller viktigt. Business made fun helt enkelt!


Vi behöver nu komplettera vårt team med utvecklare som har några års erfarenhet. Visst är det du?
  

  

**Hänger du med oss på Wint får du:**

  

* Jobba tight tillsammans med drivna och kreativa kollegor
* Vara med och driva förändring
* En vardag där vi tillsammans både arbetar och tänker nytt inom flera områden
* 

**Om rollen**


Att automatisera bokföring är spännande men inte helt okomplicerat, det ligger en hel del fint hantverk bakom kulisserna. Vi behöver nu förstärkning och vi söker dig som har några års erfarenhet från att ha jobbat som utvecklare, och som vill vara med och ta Wint till nya höjder. På Wint har vi flera tech team, och du kommer ingå i ett av dem. Tillsammans med teamet utvecklar ni nya funktioner som ni i och med vår korta iterationer snart får se användas live av våra kunder. Du jobbar nära din tech lead, testare, UX designer och våra ekonomer.


På Wint jobbar vi med att bygga en disruptiv helhetsprodukt för Sveriges företagare. Det går som tåget och för att vi ska kunna hjälpa så många kunder som möjligt behöver vi fortsätta utveckla vår tjänst med fokus på skalbarhet, och det är där du kommer in i bilden! Men mer om det när vi ses


**Vem är du?**


Vi ser att du har ett brinnande intresse för mjukvaruutveckling och problemlösning i olika former och att du naturligt delar med dig av din kunskap till teamet. Vi vill att du har erfarenhet från en eller eller ett par produktstackar vilket vi tror har tagit dig minst tre år. Du förstår fördelarna med testdriven utveckling men samtidigt också värdet i att lösa problem här och nu, när behovet är som störst.


På Wint driftar vi vårt system inklusive dess AI-baserade tjänster på Azure, vi utvecklar micro services i .Net/C#, vår frontend i React, utvecklar och testar med Docker och hanterar vår kod i Github. Kanske har du erfarenhet av en liknande miljö eller av Linux? Vi vet att grymma utvecklare lär sig snabbt  

  



* Du är ansvarsfull och strukturerad
* Du är flexibel, positiv, prestigelös
* Du vågar ta initiativ och är driven
* Du pratar både svenska och engelska

**Varför Wint?**  

  

Hos oss får du ett förmånspaket med bland annat högsta belopp för friskvårdsbidrag, flexibla arbetstider och högt förtroende från närmsta chef. Du får, både i närmsta teamet och utanför, kompetenta kollegor med ett positivt mindset som alltid siktar högre och vill utvecklas. Du kommer dessutom att få förutsättningen att träna upp din pingisteknik, på 23:e våningen i Kineum-huset i Gårda Men det viktigaste av allt; du får möjlighet att utveckla dig själv och Wints produkt då du kommer att vara en del av en ständigt rörlig vardag i ett entreprenöriellt bolag.



Den röda tråden i vår verksamhet är just teamet, där vi kämpar tillsammans sida vid sida, vi delar på arbetsuppgifter och firar våra framgångar gemensamt. Vi siktar högre, vi tror på det vi gör och vi gör det tillsammans!

**Låter det lockande?** **Vi väntar med spänning på att få träffa dig så se till att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!**


Vi tror på forskningsbaserade och objektiva utvärderingsmetoder som stöd i arbetet att hitta rätt person till rätt roll. Av den anledningen använder vi Alva Labs bedömningsmetoder i våra rekryteringsprocesser för att hjälpa oss att identifiera kandidater med störst sannolikhet att trivas och passa rollen.

**Vi har valt att själva sköta rekryteringen till denna tjänst, och tackar därför nej till all eventuell hjälp från dig som säljer annonser och rekryteringstjänster.**

title: Systemutvecklare till växande IT-konsultbolag
description:
I rollen som konsult hos oss får du ett omväxlande jobb med en mängd olika arbetsuppgifter. Du kommer erbjudas konsultuppdrag där du snabbt utvecklar din egen kompetens och kunskap inom relevanta områden. Våra kunder är främst medelstora och stora bolag med spännande miljöer i teknisk framkant.

**Din profil**
--------------


Vi söker dig som har ett stort tekniskt intresse. Att du gillar att koda och hitta lösningar på problem ser vi som en självklarhet.


Vi tror att du har hunnit samlat på dig några års erfarenhet ute på arbetsmarknaden, kanske 5-6 år. Vi ser det som meriterande om du har relevant akademisk utbildning även om erfarenhet och kunskap kan väga upp för avsaknad utbildning. Vilket programmeringsspråk du har kunskaper i är sekundärt men vi tror att du har ett par språk som du är extra förtjust i. Att du talar och uttrycker dig väl på både svenska och engelska är ett krav.


Befattningen kan komma att kräva att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tids gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där krav finns på säkerhetsklassinplacering, kan i förekommande fall, medföras krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vi tror att du är analytiskt lagd, har ett stort initiativtagande, gillar att arbeta systematiskt och har fötterna på jorden. I ditt arbete som konsult läggs stor vikt på att kunna samarbeta med andra på ett konstruktivt sätt och att kunna leverera projekt på utsatt tid.

**Vilk****a är vi?**
--------------------


SysPartner erbjuder konsultation inom infrastruktur och systemutveckling samt hostinglösningar och helhetskoncept för IT-drift. Vi grundades i Linköping 2005 och har sedan dess expanderat till ytterligare tre städer, och vi finns idag även i Stockholm, Västerås och Luleå.


SysPartner strävar efter att vara det lilla familjära företaget samtidigt som våra konsulter ofta får chansen att arbeta i en större organisation med spännande tekniska lösningar hos våra kunder. SysPartner lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och vad du själv kan inbringa till företaget. Att ta med sig sina personliga intressen till arbetsplatsen är mer än uppskattat! Du kommer som medarbetare att få ta del av givmilda personalförmåner och få vara delaktig i en mängd sociala aktiviteter som ordnas av företaget årligen.

**Varför ska du arbeta hos oss?**
---------------------------------


Gillar du att arbeta med teknik i den yttersta framkant av teknologisk utveckling så är vi trygga med att kunna tillgodose ditt behov. För oss är det också av yttersta vikt att på riktigt ta hand om vår personal. Därför ser vi oss själva som det lilla familjära företaget, även om vi idag har kontor i både Linköping, Stockholm, Luleå och Västerås.


Vi uppskattar när våra medarbetare tar med sig sina personliga intressen till vår arbetsplats och vi erbjuder generösa personalförmåner och ser till att vi har kul tillsammans genom sociala aktiviteter.


Nu har vi siktet inställt på Mälardalen och hoppas att du vill vara med på vår fortsatta tillväxtresa.


Vi hoppas att du blir nyfiken och skickar in en ansökan så att vi kan få träffas och berätta mer!

title: Fullstack-utvecklare till Varberg
description:
Vill du vara en viktig del av ett växande bolag och utveckla nya produkter och innovativa lösningar inom mjukvara? Då kan detta vara jobbet för dig!

 ***Kund*** *är en ledande aktör inom klimatsmarta och energieffektiva lösningar och utvecklar smart mjukvara och system som hjälper deras uppdragsgivare att nå sina hållbarhetsmål. Företaget har en stark marknadsposition och värnar om sina långsiktiga kundrelationer. Du kommer in i välmående verksamhet där där dina närmaste kollegor kommer göra sitt yttersta för att du ska trivas så bra som möjligt.*

  

Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

**Om tjänsten**  

Rollen kräver djup kunskap inom både frontend och backend, med ett särskilt fokus på backend-utveckling. Du kommer få en viktig roll och ges möjlighet att arbeta med deras avancerade lösningar som är driftsatta i Azure cloud.


I rollen kommer du att:

  

* Spela en nyckelroll i att bygga och utveckla nya produkter, funktioner och processer.
* Tillhöra ett agilt utvecklingsteam där din kompetens på bästa sätt kommer komma till användning.

 **Du erbjuds**

  

* Att vara en del av ett stabilt och växande företag som satsar på sina anställda.
* Stora utvecklingsmöjligheter samt utbildningar.
* Att vara med och bygga och utveckla en helt ny produkt.
* En företagskultur som präglas av passion, trygghet, kreativitet och kompetens.
* Goda anställningsvillkor och en härlig arbetsmiljö.

 **Vi söker dig som**

* Är en erfaren Fullstack-profil med gedigen kompetens inom implementationer av back-end, databasarkitektur och flöden mellan front- och back-end.
* Är självgående och en fena på fullstackutveckling i .NET/C#.
* Har goda kunskaper / behärskar Azure devops, Azure cloud, Kubernetes, Helm, Docker.
* Har starka problemlösningsförmågor och har lätt för att samarbeta med andra.
* Är en engagerad person med starkt driv att vilja bidra till utvecklingen på företaget.


Meriterande med förståelse för och erfarenhet av CQRS.

**Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Varberg eller Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryteringskonsult Sofie Andersson:  

sofie@futuriapeople.se

Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

title: Systemutvecklare/Systemförvaltare till kund inom förvarsindustrin
description:
Är du en driven systemutvecklare/systemförvaltare som brinner för att skapa stabila och effektiva IT-lösningar? Vi söker dig som vill vara med och drifta samt vidareutveckla våra system för 3D-baserade underhållsinstruktioner och teknisk information inom sektionen.


### **Om rollen**



Som systemutvecklare/systemförvaltare hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att säkerställa att våra IT-system fungerar smidigt och utvecklas för att möta verksamhetens behov. Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:


* Daglig drift och utveckling av system som **Delmia**, **Catia Composer** och egenutvecklade applikationer i **C# .NET**.
* Övervakning, felsökning, felrättning och testning.
* Framtagning och uppdatering av systemdokumentation.
* Utveckling av lösningsförslag och översättning av verksamhetskrav till tekniska lösningar.
* Samarbete med verksamhetsområden inom konstruktion, produktion och underhåll.

### **Kvalifikationer**



Vi ser gärna att du har följande kompetenser:


* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom datateknik, IT eller systemvetenskap.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling i **C# .NET**, gärna med tekniker som **WPF** och **MVVM**.
* Kunskap i skriptutveckling med exempelvis **Visual Basic Script** eller **Powershell**.
* Erfarenhet av versionshantering med **GIT** och ärendehantering i **JIRA**.
* Erfarenhet av systemförvaltning eller systemadministration inom **Windows Server** och **Oracle SQL**.
* Kunskap om integrationer och felsökning i komplexa system.
* Erfarenhet av **PDM-system** och agila arbetsmetoder.

### **Personliga egenskaper**



Vi söker dig som är:


* **Ansvarstagande** och engagerad i ditt arbete.
* Lösningsorienterad med god analytisk förmåga.
* Kommunikativ, både på **svenska** och **engelska**.

### **Vi erbjuder**



Hos oss får du möjligheten att utvecklas i en teknisk miljö som präglas av innovation, samarbete och spännande utmaningar. Du blir en viktig del av ett team som arbetar för att stödja och förbättra vår produktion av teknisk information.


*Fortsatt intresserad av rollen?*



Vad kul! Då får du mer än gärna ansöka med ett CV så hör vi av oss för ett eventuellt nästa steg i processen.



Den här rekryteringsprocessen administreras av Job Solution Consulting, och kunden har begärt att alla frågor angående tjänsten hanteras av Job Solution Consulting. Om du blir antagen till den här rollen kommer du att agera som konsult via Job Solution Consulting. Under tiden som konsult hos oss är du ansluten till kollektivavtal med mera.



För eventuella frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att höra av dig till mig. Du når mig på fredrik.hovstadius@jobsolution.se.

title: Developer
description:
**Are you our new star in the tech team?**

  

As a **Developer** with Front-End Focus, you will play a key role in designing and implementing user interfaces across our AI-driven products like Voxo Event and Voxo Insights. You have gained some hands-on experience in at least one or two roles post-education and are ready to take on new challenges. Your curiosity and eagerness to learn will help us continuously enhance our products’ user experience and visual appeal.


From translating design concepts into functional code to optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability, you’ll actively contribute to every stage of our front-end development process. You will closely collaborate with designers, back-end developers, and product teams to deliver seamless, intuitive user interfaces that delight our customers.

**What You'll Do**

* **UI Implementation**: Develop responsive, interactive, and visually appealing user interfaces using modern front-end technologies.
* **Expanding role:** Expand into backend and AI-layers of our platform.
* **Team Collaboration**: Partner with designers and the tech team to create versatile solutions that meet user needs.
* **Performance Optimization**: Ensure front-end code is efficient, maintainable, and scalable.
* **Continuous Learning**: Keep up to date with emerging trends, frameworks, and tools in front-end development.
* **User Feedback Integration**: Utilize feedback and analytics to improve functionality and enhance the user experience.

 **We Are Looking For**


You are a curious, proactive individual who loves coding elegant interfaces and is excited about AI technology. You thrive in a team-oriented environment, are open to learning new concepts, and value code quality and user-centric design.

 **Requirements**

* **Experience**: Some professional experience in development (preferably front-end), having held one or two positions after completing your education.
* **Technical Skills**: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and familiarity with modern frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* **Education**: Degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field.
* **Language**: Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.

 **Meritorious**

* **UI/UX Collaboration**: Experience working closely with designers or understanding design principles.
* **Version Control**: Familiarity with Git and team-based coding practices.
* **AI Interest**: A keen interest in how AI technologies can improve user experiences and processes.

 **What We Offer**

* **Innovative Environment**: Engage with cutting-edge AI technologies that shape the future.
* **Professional Growth**: Advance your skills and career with diverse learning opportunities.
* **Collaborative Culture**: Join a supportive team that values your input and growth.
* **Continuous Learning**: Access mentorship and resources to explore new technologies.
* **Global Reach**: Interact with clients and colleagues worldwide, broadening your perspective.

**About Voxo Event**


Voxo Event offers AI-driven real-time insights and summaries for events, including keynote speeches, panel discussions, and roundtable talks. Through our services, participants can stay informed via live visualizations and summaries directly on screens or mobile devices. Voxo's AI generates daily summaries and customized reports that help organizers, participants, and companies gain a better overview of the most important discussions. Our technology creates value both during and after the event by extending the impact of these discussions. Read more at https://www.voxoevent.ai!

**About Voxo Insights**


Voxo Insights is a state-of-the-art conversation analysis platform that turns all your customer interactions into actionable insights. By automatically transcribing, categorizing, and summarizing every voice and text conversation, our AI-powered system provides real-time understanding of customer needs, sentiments, and feedback. Voxo Insights assigns satisfaction and turnaround scores through sentiment analysis, helping businesses identify factors influencing customer satisfaction. Utilizing generative AI, we systematically uncover and organize all customer feedback into accessible reports. Our technology empowers marketing, sales, customer service, and operations teams with valuable data to make informed decisions, improve products and processes, and enhance overall customer experiences. Read more at https://www.voxo.ai!


Ready to take your developer skills to the next level and help shape the future of AI-driven solutions? Apply now and grow with Voxo!

title: Software Developer, Boden, Sverige
description:
*Do you want to contribute to create positive environmental impact on society? If so, you can be our next talented employee.*  

  

*Research shows that women and other under-represented groups within our industry hesitate to apply unless they tick most boxes of a role description. At Stegra, we are building an impact company with sustainability at its core. We need a diverse, inclusive, and authentic team to rally behind our purpose of de-carbonizing hard-to-abate industries, starting with steel.*  

  

So, if you are equally passionate about our purpose yet concerned that your experience doesn’t perfectly align with the qualifications stated in the job advert, we strongly encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate, either for this role – or for another upcoming role in our rapidly growing business.
  

  

**About us:**  

  

Stegra is on a mission to disrupt the global steel industry by producing green steel, with the end goal of bringing down CO2 emissions to zero. By using green hydrogen and fossil-free electricity instead of coal; water and heat will be our primary emissions. By 2030, our ambition is to produce 5 million tonnes of green steel annually in our fully integrated, digitalized, and sustainable plant in Boden, located in northern Sweden - currently in construction phase. But this is just the beginning – our expertise in green hydrogen will enable us to decarbonize other industries in addition to steel, and we look forward to what’s next in store for us.
  

  

We are looking for talented, innovative, and purpose-driven people to join our rapidly growing and diverse team. Our employees get to learn everyday, implement the latest technology and test and put their ideas into practice. Together, we are building an impact company with sustainability at its core – for our people, customers, investors, society, and planet.
  

  

**Software Developer**  

  

At Stegra Digital we believe in business truthfulness and accordingly work in business aligned cross functional teams. Our teams work with operations and development over the whole digital technology stack: integrations, operations, analytical data and front end. We want you and your teammates to grow outside your respective areas of expertise to solve business’ challenges as they occur.
  

  

We are looking for developers who are passionate believers in microservice principles and wants to build a truly digital organization. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our microservice infrastructure, with a focus on enabling tailored solutions and integrations as required by our business. You will work closely with domain experts to understand their ways of working and build solutions that meet those needs. You will also be responsible for developing and maintaining our DevSecOps procedures and governance policies.
  

  

This position is based in Boden and is part of Stegra’s Digital Factory Team.
  

  

About seniority
  

  

We are actively seeking developers with varying levels of expertise, ranging from recent university graduates to seasoned professionals. The level of seniority you bring will correspond to the qualifications and experiences outlined below, with more senior candidates expected to possess a broader spectrum of these attributes.
  

  

**Some soft qualities we value**  

  

* You are curious about new things, but always balancing new ideas towards existing wisdom.
* You appreciate diverse viewpoints when tackling challenges yet understands the significance of reaching a consensus and adhering to the established pattern for effective collaboration.
* You are passionate about what you are doing and have a genuine interest in delivering great solutions.
* You embody a service-oriented mindset, making yourself accessible to your business colleagues. Recognizing that value is substantiated when business needs are met.
* You communicate effortlessly both verbally and in writing with colleagues and external parties within completely different domains/areas of expertise.
* You possess the ability to analyze and break down a bigger problem into smaller, graspable parts.
You appreciate the importance of understanding and connecting with the organization's mission, goals, and strategies.  
* 

  

  

**Qualifications we look for**  

  

An academic degree in computer science, data science or a related field, or equivalent practical experience  

* 

  

  

**Tech knowledge and experience we appreciate**  

  

We are building teams in several disciplines and we are looking for a broad range of skill sets. For some examples, see below:
  

* Development experience from event driven microservice environments using RESTful APIs
* Kotlin and Spring Boot in containerized environments
* IT/OT integrations and process design in edge nodes towards process equipment
* Message-broker platforms like RabbitMQ or similar.
* Automated software building, testing and deployment using GitLab CI/CD
* Infrastructure as Code using Terraform
* Hands on experience working with Kubernetes clusters or similar
* Hands on experience working with AWS S3, Snowflake and dbt or similar
In our agile environment, every team requires a dedicated agile servant to unlock its full potential. If you're passionate about fostering team efficiency and collaboration, you may also be an ideal scrum master.  
* 

  

  

**What we can offer you**  

  

If you are passionate about making actual change and having a positive impact on society and our planet, Stegra offers a unique opportunity to be part of a fun and professional team with high ambitions.
  

  

You will get the opportunity to shape your future career together with a company focusing on creating a culture where everyone can thrive and feel a sense of belonging. In the end, we know that Stegra’s growth and success is dependent on our people and we can’t wait to shape the future of steelmaking and other industries together as a team.
  

  

**How to apply?**  

  

See the vacancy here and apply online:
  

  

https://arbetsformedlingen.se/platsbanken/annonser/29099272
  

  

Latest application date is 01.03.2025  

  

  

  

  

*About Stegra*  

  

*Founded in 2020, Stegra (formerly H2 Green Steel) was created with the purpose to decarbonize hard-to-abate industry. Construction of our first project – an integrated plant producing green hydrogen, green iron and green steel – is well underway in Boden, Sweden. Slashing emissions using green hydrogen and renewable electricity, we’re starting a clean industrial revolution. Steel is just the beginning.*  

  

*We are building a diverse and rapidly growing team spread across our site and offices in Boden and Stockholm, targeting close to 1500 employees by the end of 2025. Together, we focus on delivering green impact – for our people, customers, investors, society and planet.*  

  

*More vacancies on* *https://stegra.com/career*

title: Algorithm Developer
description:
- Aptiv’s Tech Center in Gothenburg is home to almost 300 employees representing more than 15 nationalities. Our office is always bustling with activity and optimism, partly owing to the fact that we are conveniently located next to the city's biggest holiday attraction, the historic Liseberg amusement park.


At the Gothenburg Technical Center, we take small steps forward each day to continuously improve our quality, our tools, our processes and ourselves.


**Area of responsibility:**


	* Work as an Advanced Algorithm Developer in one of the development teams
	* Provide inputs to ADAS/AD technology roadmap and leading technical discussions
	* Investigate, evaluate and evolvement of new technology solutions and methodology for future ADAS/AD software products
	* Leading Proof of Concept studies on new methods and algorithms
	* Development and integration of algorithms in C++
	* Quality assurance according to Aptiv process and industry standards
	* Continuous improvement of supporting factors, e.g., simulation tools and testing environment
	* Define use-cases and test scenarios in regular data collection and vehicle testing activities
	* Troubleshooting and issue resolution for ongoing programs and projects
	* Interaction with system & testing teams, customers and project management.**Required education or other training/alternative equal experience**


	* Master or PhD degree in Control Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or equivalent qualification.**Needed experience, describe type of competence area for the experience, what type of previous positions needed, length of experience etc, depth of skills**


	* Minimum 1 year of ADAS/AD algorithm development experience.
	* Minimum 1 year experience on AI/ML, ideally in ADAS/AD domain.
	* Hands-on experiences with popular deep learning frameworks, e.g., PyTorch and TensorFlow.
	* Proven records with design and realization of neural networks.
	* Good understanding of radar, vision and lidar perception
	* Solid understanding of ADAS feature functions, scenario-based evaluation and testing of ADAS algorithm.
	* Experienced in C/C++ programming, MATLAB and/or Python
	* Strong problem solving skills and mindset to learn and grow
	* Excellent communication, team work & social skills, goal-oriented and structured way of working.
	* Experience in NCAP and GSR requirements.
	* Fluent in English written and verbally.
	* European driver’s license (class B)**Specific competences/other skills needed for the position:**


	* Experience in handling the stochastic nature of sensing and perception functionality
	* Experience in automotive standards, e.g., A-Spice and ISO26262
	* Experience in automotive software development
	* Experience working with GIT/Gerrit/Jenkins, Jira or similar
	* Knowledge in automotive communication protocols (CAN, FlexRay, Ethernet etc.)
	* Preferred: Previous Start of Production (SOP) experience of ADAS projects**Why join us?**


	* You can grow at Aptiv. Aptiv provides an inclusive work environment where all individuals can grow and develop, regardless of gender, ethnicity or beliefs.
	* You can have an impact. Safety is a core Aptiv value; we want a safer world for us and our children, one with: Zero fatalities, Zero injuries, Zero accidents.
	* You have support. We ensure you have the resources and support you need to take care of your family and your physical and mental health with a competitive health insurance package.**Your Benefits at Aptiv:**


	* Competitive compensation package.
	* Learning, professional growth and development in a world-recognized international environment.
	* Access to internal & external training, coaching & certifications.
	* Recognition for innovation and excellence.
	* Opportunities to give back to the community.
	* Meaningful work that makes a difference in the world.
	* Breakfast and fruit at the Molndalsvagen office served 3 days a week.
	* Opportunities to give back to the community.
	* Meaningful work that makes a difference in the world.**Apply today, and together let’s change tomorrow!**

Privacy Notice - Active Candidates: https://www.aptiv.com/privacy-notice-active-candidates


Aptiv is an equal employment opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: System Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity**


Traffic Control System's main responsibility is traffic steering and traffic optimization within the Radio Access Network (RAN).


The scope of our unit in the System Department of Product Engineering Unit RAN Services spans from early concept studies through systemization and supporting during development to deployment in the field. The technical domain we drive and develop includes higher-layer interfaces and protocols, algorithms for mobility, connection handling, dual connectivity, and carrier aggregation.


We are looking for colleagues that will work within all the phases of the product development with emphasis on the sophisticated traffic steering functions that is key to an outstanding 5G, and further on 6G system!


In this role you will join a community of our highly qualified system engineers spanning across the globe, working to develop the best performing products in the industry. You will drive innovation with us through system studies on various abstraction levels and interact with developers and testers both locally and at our international sites.

  

Vetting including references and relevant background screening will be conducted for final candidates, if selected for job stage 7.

**What you will do**

* Develop word-class functionality within the newest generations of mobile communication network
* Break down requirements for, and systemize, functionalities like; mobility, dual connectivity, carrier aggregation and RAN Services, including voice, slicing, and fixed wireless access (FWA)
* Systemize higher layer RAN interfaces
* Engage with customers in technical presentations
* Work both in teams and individually

 **The skills you bring**

* MSc level (or higher) in a technical field or the equivalent level of knowledge. Education and experience in telecommunication are positive
* Experience with RAN technologies: skills in working with Radio Access Network systems, including Massive MIMO, beamforming, and other features
* An ability to plan and drive your work, as well as collaborate in teams to reach common goals
* A positive approach and can-do mindset
* Excellent interpersonal and presentation skills
* Excellent speaking and writing skills in English

 **Additional skills you possess that would be an asset to the position**

* Programming and scripting skills: C/C++, Python and/or Java. Experience with software development practices like version control (Git) and CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment)
* Experience with simulations and modelling: ability to use tools like MATLAB or system simulators to design, model and optimize RAN performance
* Experience in Agile methodologies
* Knowledge, experience, and background from working as a System Developer

 **Application**


Last day to apply: December 18, 2024. The position is based in Kista, Sweden. We are reviewing applications on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

 **Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Android Automotive Software Developer
description:
Job Description


Within AFRY, we develop and deliver solutions for vehicles, systems, functions and attributes to customers in the automotive industry. Our customers are both established OEM's, startup companies and system suppliers (Tier 1). We operate all over the world; mainly in Sweden, China, Brazil, US and UK.


We are now looking for experienced software developers who is passionate in developing the next generation infotainment system based on Google's Android automotive OS.


As an Android Automotive Software Developer, you will be doing Software development in application and native layers of Android stack for the infotainment system. You will collaborate with UX, Designers and other stakeholders to define a coherent end-to-end solution. You will be part of a team that has end-to-end responsibility including design, architecture, documentation, development, verification and validation. As part of organization you will have the opportunity to actively contribute for generating innovative ideas and solutions.


Qualifications


* M.Sc in Software Engineering or equivalent experience through years of practice
* Experience of Android app and Android platform development along with experience in AOSP and the AOSP build system.
* Familiar with modern app architectural patterns (MVP, MVVM, layered architecture, refactoring)
* Experience in Automotive communication buses
* Good knowledge in Android Java, C++, Python
* Good knowledge of Android testing frameworks (Junit, Espresso, Mockito)
* Very good knowledge of English (written and spoken) is essential
* Excellent communication skills


Meritorious if you have:

* Experience of Embedded Linux Development
* Experience of working with CI (Continuous Integration)
* Swedish driving license (B-level)


We are looking for a team player who like to share your knowledge with your colleagues. You have a good ability to work together with others, and you enjoy having a lot of responsibility and the opportunity to influence. In addition to this, you like to bring new suggestions and ideas to the tabe for the group's future development.

*AFRY provides engineering, design, digital and advisory services. We are devoted experts in industry, energy and infrastructure sectors, creating impact for generations to come. AFRY has Nordic roots with a global reach. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable society.*


Additional Information

Daniel Sletteberg Loveryd- Section Manager  

daniel.slettebergloveryd@afry.com

jie.qiao@afry.com


We refrain from direct contact with staffing and recruitment companies and sellers of additional job advertisements.

Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable future.*

title: Frontend-utvecklare
description:
**Hey! 👋** 




  






 Cone Digital is looking for a talented front-end developer to join our team and craft stunning, high-performing headless e-commerce stores. If you’re eager to work with some of Sweden’s largest e-commerce brands, sharpen your front-end skills, and dive into a modern tech stack (Next.js, Vercel), this role is calling your name!
 




  





  





**About Cone Digital** 




  






 At Cone Digital, we partner with Sweden’s top e-commerce brands, helping them create seamless, beautiful, and fast online experiences. Some of our amazing clients include Nelly, Kids Brand Store, and Skistar. We combine a passion for design and user experience with cutting-edge technologies, delivering exceptional quality in every project.
 




  





  





**Our Tech Stack** 




  





**We work with:** 




  




* React, Next.js, and React Native
* Vercel, Netlify
* TypeScript, tailwind and shadcn
* Shopify/Shopify Plus, Brink commerce, Centra
* Storyblok, Sanity, Contentful, Dato



  





  





**Why You’ll Love Working at Cone Digital** 




  




* Collaborative and Agile Teams: We keep it simple—small, focused teams working towards building exceptional headless e-commerce stores without endless meetings or unnecessary procedures.
* Design-Driven Development: Great design isn’t an afterthought here—it’s a priority. We care deeply about user experience and work closely with designers to ensure our solutions are both visually stunning and practical to implement.
* Performance and Accessibility: We take Web Vitals seriously, ensuring every project is fast, accessible, and SEO-friendly while maintaining top-notch user experiences.
* Forward-Thinking Clients: Our clients are high-profile brands who value innovation and quality. Your work will be seen and admired by many!



  





  





**What We’re Looking For** 




  





**Must-Have Skills:** 



* 5+ years of experience in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
* Experience with React Native
* Proficiency in React (bonus for Next.js)
* Experience building responsive, high-quality layouts
* An eye for design detail and a strong focus on user experience
* Awareness of web performance best practices (e.g., Core Web Vitals) and accessibility standards
* Experience working with third-party APIs
* Fluency in both spoken and written English



  





**Nice-to-Have Skills:** 



* Background in e-commerce development
* Experience with headless CMS



  





  





**What’s in It for You?** 




  






 At Cone Digital, you’ll work on exciting projects, collaborate with an exceptional team, and have the opportunity to shape the future of e-commerce development. Plus, you’ll get the satisfaction of seeing your work shine for some of the most recognizable brands in the industry.
 




  





  






 Ready to take your skills to the next level and create amazing things?
 




**Join us at Cone Digital!**

title: Software Engineer
description:
The era of pervasive AI has arrived. In this era, organizations will use generative AI to unlock hidden value in their data, accelerate processes, reduce costs, drive efficiency and innovation to fundamentally transform their businesses and operations at scale.
   

  

 SambaNova Suite™ is the first full-stack, generative AI platform, from chip to model, optimized for enterprise and government organizations. Powered by the intelligent SN40L chip, the SambaNova Suite is a fully integrated platform, delivered on-premises or in the cloud, combined with state-of-the-art open-source models that can be easily and securely fine-tuned using customer data for greater accuracy. Once adapted with customer data, customers retain model ownership in perpetuity, so they can turn generative AI into one of their most valuable assets.
   

  

 If you recently graduated (within the past 2 years) or will graduate within the upcoming academic year and are interested in full-time software engineering opportunities with the leading AI startup, please apply below and tell us a little about yourself! If there's a match someone will be in contact.
   

  

 We are looking especially for engineers with
 **two or more** 
 of the following skill sets:
   

  

* Tooling and Infrastructure
* System Software
* Machine Learning & Applications
* Computer Architecture
* Hardware / Software Co-Design


**Benefits Summary For US-Based Full-Time Direct Employment Positions**
**(The Recruiter will provide benefit details for non-US-based roles)**
 SambaNova offers a competitive total rewards package, including the base salary, plus equity and benefits. We cover 95% premium coverage for employee medical insurance, and 77% premium coverage for dependents and offer a Health Savings Account (HSA) with employer contribution. We also offer Dental, Vision, Short/Long term Disability, Basic Life, Voluntary Life, and AD&D insurance plans in addition to Flexible Spending Account (FSA) options like Health Care, Limited Purpose, and Dependent Care. Our library of well-being benefits available to you and your dependents includes a full subscription to Headspace, Gympass+ membership with access to physical gyms, One Medical membership, counseling services with an Employee Assistance Program, and much more.
   

  

**Submission Guidelines**
 Please note that in order to be considered an applicant for any position at SambaNova Systems, you must submit an application form for each position for which you believe you are qualified.
   

  

*If you are a new, recent (within the last two years), or upcoming college graduate and are interested in opportunities with SambaNova Systems, please apply through our university job listings.*
**EEO Policy**
 SambaNova Systems is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard basis of age (40 and over), color, disability, gender identity, genetic information, marital status, military or veteran status, national origin/ancestry, race, religion, creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding), sexual orientation, and any other applicable status protected by federal, state, or local laws.

title: Full Stack Developer
job_function: Engineering, Business Development, and Information Technology
company_industry: Internet Marketplace Platforms, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Artists and Writers
description:
**Barnebys Group AB** 
 is the world’s leading ecosystem for art, antiques, and collectibles throughout the value chain. Founded in Stockholm, Sweden, in 2011, we have established our business globally with offices in the UK and a presence in the US, France, Spain, and Germany. Our clients include the world’s top-tier auctioneers, antique dealers, and galleries, as well as regional and local businesses.
 



 We offer a search service with 600,000+ items for sale, an extensive database of auction results, and a white-label auction and gallery system. We are now looking to grow our business even further and are seeking top talent to join our team.
 



  





 We’re a small, close-knit team looking for a proactive, open-minded developer to join us. In this role, you’ll play a pivotal part in building and maintaining our platform, which powers our original and highly valuable
 **Traffic business** 
 .
 



  





 Our platform is built on technologies like
 **React, NextJS, TypeScript, Python, PHP, Kubernetes, and MySQL** 
 , ensuring scalability and reliability. We’re dedicated to continuous improvement and following sound development practices to deliver a world-class product.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* **Build, Improve, and Optimize Systems:** 
 Design, build, and maintain reliable, scalable, and efficient systems—spanning backend services, APIs, and frontend interfaces—using technologies like FastAPI, Flask, NodeJS, Symfony, React/NextJS, MySQL, BigQuery, Redis, and MongoDB. Ensure performance, scalability, and security, particularly for data-heavy use cases.
* **Implement DevOps Practices:** 
 Deploy and manage solutions using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms like Azure, AWS, and GCP.
* **Focus on User Experience:** 
 Contribute to frontend design and development using tools like React, NextJS, SASS, and TailwindCSS to ensure seamless user experiences.
* **Architect Scalable Systems:** 
 Design scalable architectures, integrating event-driven solutions with tools like LavinMQ, RabbitMQ, and Azure Service Bus for efficient communication.
* **Collaborate Across Teams:** 
 Work closely with product owner, designer, and other developers to deliver high-quality solutions aligned with business needs.



  





**Who You Are** 




 We believe you have
 **at least 4 years of hands-on experience** 
 as a developer, with knowledge in several of the following areas:
 


* **Frontend Skills:** 
 Experience with React, NextJS, and modern frontend practices using SASS, TailwindCSS, or similar tools.
* **Backend and API Development:** 
 Proficiency in NodeJS, Python, or similar, with experience in frameworks like FastAPI, Flask, Express, or Symfony.
* **Database Expertise:** 
 Proficiency in MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis, as well as exposure to data tools like BigQuery.
* **DevOps and Cloud:** 
 Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud environments such as Azure, AWS, or GCP.
* **Event-Driven Systems:** 
 Experience with queueing systems like LavinMQ, Service Bus, or RabbitMQ.
* **Agile Practices:** 
 Comfortable working in an Agile or Scrum setting, with a focus on delivering value iteratively.



  





**Nice to Have:** 




 Familiarity with mobile app development, Google Analytics, SEO, Google Tag Manager, Unix, and CI/CD pipelines.
 



  





**What Matters to Us** 




 At Barnebys, we value more than just great code. Our friendly, supportive culture—built on traditions like Monday breakfasts and Team Fika—
 **fosters collaboration** 
 , growth, and a healthy work-life balance.
 



  





 Personality is as important as competence. We seek pragmatic, solution-oriented individuals who can deliver high-quality, adaptable code that drives value without unnecessary complexity. Taking initiative, offering thoughtful proposals, and embracing a
 **team-first mindset** 
 are key.
 



 Aligned with Agile values, we focus on delivering value efficiently while fostering a supportive,
 **people-first cultur** 
 e where the team’s success comes first.
 



  





**What We Offer** 



* Work with modern technologies on impactful projects.
* Play a key role in shaping the company’s future both technically and strategically.
* A supportive, innovative team that values your ideas and entrepreneurial spirit.
* Grow personally and professionally in a diverse and inclusive environment.
* Make a global impact, shaping products for auction houses worldwide and seeing your work's results.



  





**Working Location** 




 We believe in flexibility and work-life balance, but at the same time, we prioritize the team’s collective success. We expect team members to be on-site four days per week to foster collaboration and maintain a strong team dynamic. If it works for the team, it works for you—team goals come before individual priorities.
 



 Join us and be part of a company shaping the future of auctions with innovative solutions! Your knowledge and creativity will be key to building the platform and processes we envision.
 



  





**We’d love to hear from you!**

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Salesforce Developer
description:
*Early 2024, EQT and Adelis took a decisive step to jointly invest in HVD Group, further expanding our fantastic group with the addition of Next One Technology and Craftnote. HVD group provides cloud-based software to customers working in the field of installation and construction across Europe, offering modern solutions to an entire industry in dire need of digitalisation. Our mission is to enable and drive an industry transformation, enhancing efficiency and sustainability for all customer segments- one business at a time! We are currently 550 employees across the group, operating in the Nordics, Germany and UK, with well over 13 000 customers and 160 000 platform users*
 As a group, all of our business units are currently undergoing a migration into a consolidated Salesforce.com CRM system, with part of the organization already live. As part of this migration process, we are looking to implement new best practices, processes and reporting standardisations across the entire group. In order to streamline this exciting journey, we are looking for an experienced Salesforce professional who is eager to be a part of our journey in defining, and building a best of breed system!
   

  

**Role description:**
 As a Salesforce developer you will be responsible for the development and maintenance of all our salesforce applications within HVD Group. Your primary focus will be custom Salesforce development and integration toward third-party services, providing guidance and support to ensure adherence to best practices. At times, this will include working with external consultants, and vendors in the integrations, and developments of the HVD Group Salesforce environment. You will be heavily engaged with various teams and stakeholders across the organization, hence it requires you to have a collaborative and problem solving attitude, where the commitment to creating quality products is essential.
   

  

**Responsibilities of this role include:**
* Translating functional requirements into technical requirements
* Designing and building high-performance, reusable, and reliable Apex code with best practices
* Ensuring the best possible quality and usage of the application
* Taking ownership of project work, and developing relationships across the organisation (should be a confident self-starter)
* Identifing bugs and aligning with requirements during debugging
* Test bug fixes to make sure they work as per requirements, then deploy them to production


**Skills and Qualifications required:**
* A bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Salesforce developer, including a strong understanding of the Salesforce platform, its architecture, and its limitations.
* Proficiency in Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, and other Salesforce development tools.
* Knowledge of web development technologies, such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Strong problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
* Salesforce developer certifications, such as Platform Developer I and II, are highly desirable.


 If you share our enthusiasm and vision but worry that your experience does not match all the specified qualifications, apply anyway! You may be the ideal candidate for this role or another in our ever-growing organization.

description:
**Barnebys Group AB** 
 is the world’s leading eco-system for art, antiques, and collectibles throughout the value chain. Founded in Stockholm, Sweden in 2011, we have established our business globally with offices in the UK and presence in the US, France, Spain and Germany.  We offer a search service with 600,000+ items for sale, an extensive database of auction results, a top-of-the-line valuation service, and a white-label auction and gallery system. We are now looking to grow our business even further and are seeking top talent to join our team.

 You are
 **comfortable** 
 communicating in

 , essential for working with our Swedish customers.



  





**What Matters to Us** 




 We believe personality is as important as competence. We value individuals who are pragmatic, solution-oriented, and capable of delivering high-quality, sustainable code that drives value without unnecessary complexity. Our focus is on building adaptable, functional solutions that evolve and improve over time.
 



  





 We’re looking for someone who takes initiative, offering thoughtful proposals instead of waiting for direction. A collaborative, transparent, and team-first mindset is essential, as is a positive, forward-thinking attitude toward challenges.
 



  





 Aligned with Agile values, we prioritize delivering value efficiently and sustainably, fostering a supportive, people-focused culture where the team’s success outweighs individual recognition.
 



  





**What We Offer**

* The opportunity to directly influence and shape the company’s future, both technically and strategically.
