title: Senior UX/UI Designer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**

  

* Bygga och förvalta designsystem med designtokens för våra varumärken
* Bygga upp komponentbibliotek i Figma för designsytemet.
* Användningstesta och tillgänglighetsgranska designsytemet.
* Vara med och ta fram mallar, principer och riktlinjer för designsytemet.
* Vara med och ta fram arbetssätt för hur de ska jobba med designsytemet i organisationen.
* Stödja och coacha teamen inom UX/UI design.
* Delta i samarbete med crossfunktionella team med UX, backendutvecklare, produktägare för att leverera en kundfokuserad användarupplevelse.

Kvalitetsgranska och kvalitetstesta allt samt jobba enligt designprocess.  
* 

  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* 5+ års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet som UX/UI designer.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att visualisera ett koncept/lösning, t.ex. genom skisser, wireframes eller prototyper, från minst fyra tidigare uppdrag/projekt.
* Minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha haft huvudansvar för framtagning, implementering och förvaltning av designsystem, samt arbete med design tokens i digitala projekt.
* Minst tre års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha arbetat med webbplatser som uppfyller tillgänglighetskravet WCAG AAA och därmed kan tillämpa metoder inom tillgänglighet och tillgänglighetsgranskning
* Erfarenhet av att implementera och förvalta komplexa designsytem i större organisationer
* Stor vana att kommunicera, hantera stakeholders, samarbeta och presentera.
* Erfarenhet i att arbeta i organisationer som arbetar i agila processer och SAFe.

  

**Meriterande**  

* Branscherfarenhet inom bank och finans.
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av lead-roll inom design och/eller av att ha arbetat med DesignOps, t.ex. utveckling av processer och arbetsätt i syfte att höja effektiviteten och kvaliteten i en grupps designarbete som helhet.
* Har god förståelse för HTML och CSS, samt erfarenhet av att samarbeta med frontend-utvecklare för att säkerställa att designen implementeras korrekt.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 12-12-2024 **Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
For our client we are looking for a **Senior UX Designer.**

 **Responsibilities:**

* Execute a range of UX tasks across the platforms, delivering intuitive and user-friendly solutions.
* Utilize your design skills to bring concepts to life, ensuring clear and impactful designs.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to refine user interfaces, enhancing overall user experience.
* Assist in managing stakeholders, understanding their needs, and aligning design solutions with business objectives.
* Communicate effectively with various teams, fostering collaboration and ensuring a well-defined design process.
* Contribute to the development and adoption of design best practices and methodologies.
* Assist in overseeing the design process from ideation to implementation, ensuring high-quality design outcomes.
* Ensure that work is delivered in accordance with set guidelines and appointed design system.
* Ensure compliance with best practice standards in UX, branding, design systems, and relevant legal and accessibility standards, ensuring optimal implementation.
* Provide guidance and support to junior designers, offering constructive feedback and mentorship.
* Actively participate in the broader UX community, contributing to knowledge sharing efforts and collaborative projects.

**Competences:**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field such as Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, User Experience, or a related discipline.
* 3-5 years of professional experience in UX design.
* Demonstrated ability to contribute to UX projects throughout the design lifecycle.
* Solid portfolio demonstrating successful design projects across various platforms and devices.
* Ability to effectively communicate design decisions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Familiarity with design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite.

  

**Required skills:** UX design, Sketch, Figma, Human-Computer Interaction, Adobe Creative Suite

**Languages:** English(Proficient)

**Location:** Gothenburg (SE)

**Assignment period:** 16 Dec 2024 - 31 Dec 2025

**Application deadline:** 12 Dec 2024

title: Product Manager
description:
**Key requirements**

 **Experience:**


Minimum 3+ years of product management experience with direct ownership of product deliverables in a tech company or startup environment.


Hands-on experience as a product owner working with a cross-functional team on agile software development and product discovery.


Proven ability to work on user-centric products, where engaging with users or customers, through conversations, feedback, and research, was a key part of shaping and delivering the product.


A passion for good design and UX, striving to deliver excellent user experiences.


Strong analytical skills and a solid technical understanding to collaborate effectively with developers.


Excellent communication and presentation skills to engage with engineers, designers, business stakeholders, and healthcare professionals alike. Fluent in English and Swedish.

**Bonus**: Experience from within the healthcare sector and/or highly regulated industries.

  


**Who you are**

  

Empathetic and accountable: You approach collaboration with kindness, balancing empathy for teammates with clear expectations and high standards for output.


Action-oriented: You take ownership when something needs doing, prioritizing progress over perfection and embracing decisions to keep momentum.


Transparent communicator: You speak up early when challenges arise, document key decisions, and share updates to keep everyone informed and aligned.


Adaptable and resilient: You embrace change with a solutions-first mindset, seeing opportunities in challenges and learning from feedback and setbacks.


Curious and collaborative: You actively seek input from others, share knowledge freely, and thrive in a team environment where ideas are explored openly.

  


**What you will do**

  

Prioritisation: Decide which features or enhancements to prioritize based on customer feedback, market research, and business objectives.


User research and validation: Leverage user research, interviews and data analytics to gather insights and validate product ideas, ensuring they align with user needs and business goals.


Tracking: Stay on top of key performance indicators (KPIs) and objectives and key results (OKRs) by actively tracking, monitoring, documenting, and regularly sharing them to ensure alignment on product success and progress.


Cross-Functional collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, marketing, and customer support, to ensure smooth product development, launch, and ongoing management.


Rapid development: Work closely with development teams to iterate on the product, respond to changes quickly, and deliver features in a timely manner.


Risk management: Identify potential risks and challenges early on, develop contingency plans, and make data-driven decisions to mitigate risks and ensure the product's success.

 **What we offer:**  

  

A role for someone ready to take full ownership of a product area while growing their expertise in strategy, analytics, and customer insights.


A product that customers already love, with plenty of room to innovate and shape its future.


The chance to be part of a growing company and make a meaningful impact.


Opportunities for personal and professional growth as we expand into new markets and verticals.


Strong base salary with future opportunities for warrants.

**Preferred start-date would be in February. During the spring our HO Product will be on maternity leave, so you will collaborate closely with other functions in the company and learn a lot.**

title: Application Configuration Specialist
description:
**Responsibilities**


As an Application Configuration Specialist at Benify, you will be responsible for ensuring the portal aligns with both internal and external requirements, managing the process from portal creation to launch. Your role involves designing, building, and updating benefit solutions according to business rules within the Benify platform for our international clients.


You will collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, as well as globally dispersed cross-functional teams. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to contribute to and support the product roadmap to facilitate further improvements. While you will be part of the Application Configuration function, your daily work will take place in an Agile squad alongside various other functions to ensure successful implementation, delivering a coherent, compliant, and fully tested solution.


As an Application Configuration Specialist, you will:

* Work in a T-Shaped manner within an Agile cross-functional globally dispersed squad, owning the full delivery lifecycle.
* Become an expert in the functionalities of Benify's platform – from creating a new portal to Go-live.
* Design, build, update and quality assure the configuration of all types of Benefits in line with best practices, business rules and financial details.
* Collaborate with clients to meet eligibility requirements within the portal, including attending client meetings to consult on our products.
* Troubleshoot and investigate configuration issues.
* Contribute and support the product roadmap.

**Personal Attributes**


We are looking for a strong **problem solver** to troubleshoot and resolve diverse issues and client requirements. You'll **collaborate** with both internal and external stakeholders, so confidence in **communication** is key. **Attention to detail** is crucial, as is the ability to take initiative and contribute to developing new ways of working within the team.


We are looking for candidates who have:

* Bachelor's degree in systems science, Web design, Media technology, Business Administration or equivalent
* Approximately one year of experience in web design, UX/UI, application specialization, or a related field
* Experience from writing HTML code
* Proficient in English, both oral and written

**The company**

Benify is an international HR tech company that provides a market-leading global benefit and total rewards platform. With over 550 Benifyers in 6 countries, we're driving success with over 1500 customers and approximately three million users around the world . We empower people to be the best they can be while fostering a sustainable and engaging work culture where employees feel engaged and included "Because People Matter".

**Perks of being a Benifyer**

* Collective agreement
* Generous wellness allowance
* 30 days vacation
* ITP1 Pension and Lifeplan - a pension tool that provides you with personalized advice to optimize your retirement planning
* Guaranteed work-life balance with a hybrid work model
* A variety of social events and activities in the offices
* You're responsible for your own development and we offer internal career opportunities

**Practical information**


Start: As soon as we find the right fit!


Extent: Full-time, 100%


Location: Stockholm, Sweden.

*Apply by submitting your CV and/or your LinkedIn profile using the application form below. We screen applications continuously and may hire someone before the last application date.*

*Please let us know if you need any reasonable adjustments for interviews by replying to the email you will receive after you apply.*

title: Team Manager for Control product development team
description:
*Are you ready to lead a highly competent product development team towards the future of Swedish ERP software? If you’re driven by people and leading operational excellence in a tech savvy environment, you should continue reading. We are now looking for a Team Manager who wants to make a tangible impact on our flagship ERP product, Control Edge.*

### **What You’ll Do**


As a **Team Manager**, you’ll take full ownership of your team’s success, focusing equally on leadership, people development, and operational excellence. You’ll lead a distributed product development team across Sweden (Stockholm, Malmö, Göteborg) and Romania, ensuring they thrive in a well-structured and engaging environment.


At our company, people are at the heart of everything we do. Our team consists of talented people working within the whole development chain from A to Z of our products in Control Business Line, consisting of; Control Edge, PX, IM & Effectplan. You will lead a team of various roles such as software developer, software architect, UX, business analyst and infrastructure engineer. In this role you will report to our Head of Product & Development for the Control business line, Ole Johan Wirsén.
  

  

Your main responsibilities will be:  

  

**People Leadership**:

* Drive people related processes in your team, such as recruitment, performance development and employee engagement.
* Coach individuals to help them grow and excel in their roles and reach their full potential.
* Drive communication and translate business strategies & OKR:s to concrete plans for your team.
* Create a culture of psychological safety, collaboration, and continuous learning.

**Drive Operational Excellence**:

* Develop and drive work methods, ensuring they align with business goals and foster productivity.
* Improve and implement processes that enhance efficiency and quality across the teams. This includes harnessing the potential of AI for internal use, to help the team work smarter, not harder.
* Ensure compliance with standards like ISO 9001 and ISO 27001, and adopt industry best practices.
* Oversee budgets, resource allocation, and team structure to ensure your department operates effectively.

### 
**What makes this role exciting**

* **Change Maker**: You’ll join us during an exciting transformation as we shift to a product-focused organization 2025.
* **Collaborative environment**: With teams in four locations, you’ll master the art of virtual leadership and foster collaboration across borders.
* **Business critical position:** You will be playing a key role in shaping both people and processes of our development team, making a tangible difference in your daily work.

### **Why join us?**


Here’s what you’ll love:

* **Personal growth**: Leadership development and a culture that prioritizes psychological safety.
* **Great perks**: Such as flexible hybrid work model, private health care insurance, brand-new office premises, access to company cabins in the Alps to mention a few.
* **A flagship product**: Work with Control Edge, our pride and joy in the Swedish financial software market.
* **Supportive culture**: Ownership, empowerment, and collaboration are core to who we are.

### **We believe that you are / have**

* A person who has a genuine interest in people, leadership and buildning professional relationships
* Degree in Computer science or Business (or equivalent work experience).
* Proven track record in leading and engaging people and optimizing processes
* Tech oriented with genuine interest for Software Development, new technologies and agile methodologies
* Knowledge of financial software solutions, from either a technical or business perspective.
* Fluency in Swedish and English

**Bonus points if you have:**

* Experience as a manager
* Familiarity, ISO standards, or Microsoft technologies.
* Insight into market trends like AI use cases or expertise in financial/ERP services.
* Success in managing remote and distributed teams.
* Insight into the financial/ERP market.

  

**Location**: Stockholm or Malmö  

  

Don't wait to seize this opportunity! We're reviewing applications as they come in, so apply today!
  

  

Questions? Contact: Ole Johan Wirsén, Head of Product & Development: +46702052440

title: UX Designer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Execute a range of UX tasks across the platforms, delivering intuitive and user-friendly solutions.
* Utilize your design skills to bring concepts to life, ensuring clear and impactful designs.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to refine user interfaces, enhancing overall user experience.
* Assist in managing stakeholders, understanding their needs, and aligning design solutions with business objectives.
* Communicate effectively with various teams, fostering collaboration and ensuring a well-defined design process.
* Contribute to the development and adoption of design best practices and methodologies.
* Assist in overseeing the design process from ideation to implementation, ensuring high-quality design outcomes.
* Ensure that work is delivered in accordance with set guidelines and appointed design system.
* Ensure compliance with best practice standards in UX, branding, design systems, and relevant legal and accessibility standards, ensuring optimal implementation.
* Provide guidance and support to junior designers, offering constructive feedback and mentorship.
* Actively participate in the broader UX community, contributing to knowledge sharing efforts and collaborative projects.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field such as Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, User Experience, or a related discipline.
* 3-5 years of professional experience in UX design.
* Demonstrated ability to contribute to UX projects throughout the design lifecycle.
* Solid portfolio demonstrating successful design projects across various platforms and devices.
* Ability to effectively communicate design decisions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Familiarity with design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite.

  

**Application deadline:** 13-12-2024  

  

**About Us**  

  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Team Manager for Control product development team
description:
*Are you ready to lead a highly competent product development team towards the future of Swedish ERP software? If you’re driven by people and leading operational excellence in a tech savvy environment, you should continue reading. We are now looking for a Team Manager who wants to make a tangible impact on our flagship ERP product, Control Edge.*

### **What You’ll Do**


As a **Team Manager**, you’ll take full ownership of your team’s success, focusing equally on leadership, people development, and operational excellence. You’ll lead a distributed product development team across Sweden (Stockholm, Malmö, Göteborg) and Romania, ensuring they thrive in a well-structured and engaging environment.


At our company, people are at the heart of everything we do. Our team consists of talented people working within the whole development chain from A to Z of our products in Control Business Line, consisting of; Control Edge, PX, IM & Effectplan. You will lead a team of various roles such as software developer, software architect, UX, business analyst and infrastructure engineer. In this role you will report to our Head of Product & Development for the Control business line, Ole Johan Wirsén.
  

  

Your main responsibilities will be:  

  

**People Leadership**:

* Drive people related processes in your team, such as recruitment, performance development and employee engagement.
* Coach individuals to help them grow and excel in their roles and reach their full potential.
* Drive communication and translate business strategies & OKR:s to concrete plans for your team.
* Create a culture of psychological safety, collaboration, and continuous learning.

**Drive Operational Excellence**:

* Develop and drive work methods, ensuring they align with business goals and foster productivity.
* Improve and implement processes that enhance efficiency and quality across the teams. This includes harnessing the potential of AI for internal use, to help the team work smarter, not harder.
* Ensure compliance with standards like ISO 9001 and ISO 27001, and adopt industry best practices.
* Oversee budgets, resource allocation, and team structure to ensure your department operates effectively.

### 
**What makes this role exciting**

* **Change Maker**: You’ll join us during an exciting transformation as we shift to a product-focused organization 2025.
* **Collaborative environment**: With teams in four locations, you’ll master the art of virtual leadership and foster collaboration across borders.
* **Business critical position:** You will be playing a key role in shaping both people and processes of our development team, making a tangible difference in your daily work.

### **Why join us?**


Here’s what you’ll love:

* **Personal growth**: Leadership development and a culture that prioritizes psychological safety.
* **Great perks**: Such as flexible hybrid work model, private health care insurance, brand-new office premises, access to company cabins in the Alps to mention a few.
* **A flagship product**: Work with Control Edge, our pride and joy in the Swedish financial software market.
* **Supportive culture**: Ownership, empowerment, and collaboration are core to who we are.

### **We believe that you are / have**

* A person who has a genuine interest in people, leadership and buildning professional relationships
* Degree in Computer science or Business (or equivalent work experience).
* Proven track record in leading and engaging people and optimizing processes
* Tech oriented with genuine interest for Software Development, new technologies and agile methodologies
* Knowledge of financial software solutions, from either a technical or business perspective.
* Fluency in Swedish and English

**Bonus points if you have:**

* Experience as a manager
* Familiarity, ISO standards, or Microsoft technologies.
* Insight into market trends like AI use cases or expertise in financial/ERP services.
* Success in managing remote and distributed teams.
* Insight into the financial/ERP market.

  

**Location**: Stockholm or Malmö  

  

Don't wait to seize this opportunity! We're reviewing applications as they come in, so apply today!
  

  

Questions? Contact: Ole Johan Wirsén, Head of Product & Development: +46702052440

Software Development

title: User Experience Designer
description:
Hello Network!
 



  





  





 I hope you're doing well today,
 



  





  





**We are currently recruiting for an interesting onsite UX Designer role for a major Swedish Agency Client based in Stockholm, Sweden:** 




  





  





**Duration: 12 months + extensions** 




**Location: Stockholm Onsite** 




**Pay Rate: Negotiable** 




**English & Swedish Speaking** 




  





  





**If you know anyone that could be suitable we offer referral rewards for a successful placement.** 




  





  





**Job Role:** 




  





  





 As a UX/UI Designer, you have documented experience of developing and working with design systems and all that it entails in at least one major company with several development teams. You can work on design both visually and functionally – of course you work according to the UX design process and have the ability to drive and keep the UX/UI work together in this.
 



  





  





**Your main tasks are to:** 




  





  




* Build and manage design systems with design tokens for our brands
* Build component libraries in Figma for the design system.
* Usability testing and accessibility review of the design system.
* Be involved in developing templates, principles and guidelines for the design system.
* Be involved in developing working methods for how they should work with the design system in the organization.
* Support and coach the teams in UX/UI design.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams with UX, backend developers, product owners to deliver a customer-focused user experience.
* Quality review and quality test everything and work according to the design process.



  





  





**Our customer is looking for you who have the following:** 




  





  




* 5+ years of relevant work experience as a UX/UI designer.
* Documented experience in visualizing a concept/solution, e.g. through sketches, wireframes or prototypes, from at least four previous assignments/projects.
* At least three years of work experience of having had the main responsibility for the development, implementation and management of design systems, as well as working with design tokens in digital projects.
* At least three years of documented work experience of having worked with websites that meet the accessibility requirement WCAG AAA and thus can apply methods in accessibility and accessibility review
* Experience in implementing and managing complex design systems in larger organizations
* Great experience in communicating, managing stakeholders, collaborating and presenting.
* Experience in working in organizations working in agile processes and SAFe.



  





  





 If you are interested, or you know someone that could be please reach out and we can arrange a time to speak?

title: Senior UX/UI-designer
description:
Offerta och IPIS har blivit Tom, Sveriges största tjänsteförmedling för bygg, flytt och städ. I vår portfölj av varumärken skapar vi transparens och tar bort hinder från bokningsprocessen - vi gör det helt enkelt lättare att hitta pålitliga hantverkare.
   

  

 Nu söker vi dig som kan axla ett helhetsansvar för vårt designarbete. Vi söker någon med gedigen erfarenhet av hela designprocessen, från grafisk design, till hypotesarbete och pixel perfect UIs. Du kommer att ingå i en kombinerad tech- och produktorganisation med fantastiska kollegor.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
* Du driver, dokumenterar och utvecklar designprocessen för att tillsammans med ditt team bygga användarvänliga produkter och flöden.
* Du tar ett helhetsgrepp från koncept, till research, färdig design och uppföljning.
* Du tar ansvar för och håller ihop ett plattformsöverskridande designsystem med komponenter och användarflöden.
* Du tar tillsammans med PM ansvar för att sprida förståelse för våra kunder och deras behov till resten av teamet.
* Du leder arbetet med, och är ambassadör för designprocessen inom ditt tvärfunktionella team och resten av organisationen.


**Vad vi söker:**
* En prestigelös lagspelare som hugger i där det krävs och van att jobba nära och kommunicera med PMs, utvecklare, marknad och sälj.
* Akademisk examen inom ex. design, HCI eller likvärdig arbetslivserfarenhet.
* Bred erfarenhet av UX/UI design från produktbolag och en portfolio som visar på förmåga att designa användarvänliga lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Figma.


**Bonus om du har:**
* Grundläggande förståelse för front-end-utveckling.
* Erfarenhet av komponentbaserade designsystem.
* Erfarenhet av att jobba i Google Analytics.


 För att trivas hos oss tror vi att du är hjälpsam, pragmatisk och värdesätter farten hos ett entreprenöriellt bolag. Hos Tom vill vi skapa en kultur där våra användare är i centrum - vi värdesätter transparens, kontinuerligt lärande och att få saker gjorda.
   

  

 Vi arbetar främst på kontoret, både i Uppsala och Stockholm. Tjänsten utgår från Stockholmskontoret - vilket snart flyttas till nya lokaler precis ovanpå centralstationen.
   

  

 Låter detta intressant? Ansök till tjänsten hos oss idag!
   

  

**Vilka är vi på TOM?**
 Kanske har du redan stött på oss utan att veta om det. TOM är ett nytt koncept, lanserat i oktober 2024, men bakom namnet finns några av Sveriges mest välkända varumärken inom förmedling och installationstjänster.
   

  

 TOM är den osynliga kraften som ser till att de som behöver hjälp snabbt och smidigt hittar rätt person för jobbet. Som anställd på TOM blir du en viktig del av detta – du bidrar till att koppla ihop människor med pålitliga experter och skapar en positiv upplevelse för alla inblandade. Här får du möjligheten att göra skillnad genom att vara länken mellan behov och lösning, och samtidigt vara med och bygga ett företag som strävar efter att förenkla vardagen för både kunder och yrkespersoner.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Tillträde: Snarast eller enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Arbetstid: Heltid
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm, arbete på Uppsalakontoret kan förekomma
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdatum: Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten kontakta Josefine, Josefine.johansson@tom.se.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Designer – Join The Vibrant Studio at Vitamin Well Group
Senior User Researcher
description:
****The role****
 The UX Research team is looking for a highly motivated and talented Senior UX Researcher who will be supporting the global product teams from Kindred's technology hub in London, UK or Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 The UX Research team at Kindred collaborates closely with Analytics, CX and Service Design. Together we deliver insight driven solutions to business and customer challenges. We collaborate with Product and Design teams to create a user-centred approach for our brands.
   

  

 If you love blending qualitative and quantitative data to tell meaningful stories about our customers and have a passion for uncovering and exposing the truth about customer/product interactions, then this role is perfect for you.
   

  

****What you will do****
* Joining our global UX Research team, you'll be part of an expanding and influential group of user researchers dedicated to spearheading user-focused research efforts.
* You will define, prioritise, and execute a program of research using a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies, and communicate actionable insights to stakeholders.
* You will work closely with colleagues within design, engineering, research, analytics, customer experience and product teams across various business areas.
* Your role will involve finding and engaging with our target audience, acting as their champion by conducting research and guiding our product design to deliver pioneering solutions that effectively address their needs.
* You will synthesise data from sources around Kindred and work closely with other insights teams to help teams develop insights.
* Your analysis will shape products used by a global customer base.
* You will advocate inclusive approaches within user research.
* As a Senior Researcher you will demonstrate the ability to mentor and train other researchers or designers in the practice of user research.


****Your experience****
* Proven extensive experience conducting user research throughout the entire product development lifecycle.
* Strong expertise in both qualitative and quantitative research methods.
* Solid interviewing skills to uncover insights on user behaviours, needs, and experiences.
* Considerable experience in creating, distributing and analysing multi-market online surveys to gather user feedback efficiently.
* Proficiency in data collection and analysis, and the ability to triangulate customer insights from a combination of data sources to derive meaningful insights.
* Solid understanding of UX principles, design thinking, and human-centred design processes.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to use storytelling to effectively convey complex research findings and recommendations to diverse stakeholders.
* Demonstrated experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams.
* Familiarity with driving UX research initiatives within an agile product development environment.
* Passion for user-centred design, empathy for users, and a commitment to delivering exceptional user experiences.
* Bachelor's or Master's degree or similar, in Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, or User Experience Research preferred.

title: Product Manager
description:
**About Meela** 




 Meela is a VC-backed mental health startup on a mission to help millions of people find the right fit therapist. Since launching in March 2023, Meela has supported over 30,000 people in finding their best-fit therapist across two countries and has been recognised as one of Europe’s hottest startups. Our CEO and founder Tiffany, was also named Female Founder of the Year.
 



  





**Product Manager at Meela – Key requirements:** 




  





**Experience.** 



* Minimum 3+ years of product management experience with direct ownership of product deliverables in a tech company or startup environment.
* Hands-on experience as a product owner working with a cross-functional team on agile software development and product discovery.
* Proven ability to work on user-centric products, where engaging with users or customers, through conversations, feedback, and research, was a key part of shaping and delivering the product.
* A passion for good design and UX, striving to deliver excellent user experiences.
* Strong analytical skills and a solid technical understanding to collaborate effectively with developers.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills to engage with engineers, designers, business stakeholders, and healthcare professionals alike.
 *Fluent in English and Swedish.*
* Bonus: Experience from within the healthcare sector and/or highly regulated industries.



  





**Who you are.** 



* Empathetic and accountable: You approach collaboration with kindness, balancing empathy for teammates with clear expectations and high standards for output.
* Action-oriented: You take ownership when something needs doing, prioritizing progress over perfection and embracing decisions to keep momentum.
* Transparent communicator: You speak up early when challenges arise, document key decisions, and share updates to keep everyone informed and aligned.
* Adaptable and resilient: You embrace change with a solutions-first mindset, seeing opportunities in challenges and learning from feedback and setbacks.
* Curious and collaborative: You actively seek input from others, share knowledge freely, and thrive in a team environment where ideas are explored openly.



  





**What you will do.** 



* Prioritisation: Decide which features or enhancements to prioritize based on customer feedback, market research, and business objectives.
* User research and validation: Leverage user research, interviews and data analytics to gather insights and validate product ideas, ensuring they align with user needs and business goals.
* Tracking: Stay on top of key performance indicators (KPIs) and objectives and key results (OKRs) by actively tracking, monitoring, documenting, and regularly sharing them to ensure alignment on product success and progress.
* Cross-Functional collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, marketing, and customer support, to ensure smooth product development, launch, and ongoing management.
* Rapid development: Work closely with development teams to iterate on the product, respond to changes quickly, and deliver features in a timely manner.
* Risk management: Identify potential risks and challenges early on, develop contingency plans, and make data-driven decisions to mitigate risks and ensure the product's success.



  





**What we offer.** 



* A role for someone ready to take full ownership of a product area while growing their expertise in strategy, analytics, and customer insights.
* A product that customers already love, with plenty of room to innovate and shape its future.
* The chance to be part of a growing company and make a meaningful impact.
* Opportunities for personal and professional growth as we expand into new markets and verticals.
* Strong base salary with future opportunities for warrants.
* Preferred start-date would be in February. During the spring our HO Product will be on maternity leave, so you will collaborate closely with other functions in the company and learn a lot.



  





**Department:** 
 Product
 



**Locations:** 
 Gothenburg, Stockholm
 



**Remote status:** 
 Hybrid

title: Game Artist
description:
Realdini Studios is a fast-paced start-up company that creates immersive games with cutting-edge AI storytelling and innovative gameplay. Join us as we lay the groundwork for something extraordinary and reshape the future of gaming experiences!
 



  





 Role Description
 



 As a Game Artist intern you’ll focus on developing game logic, features, and functionality using Unreal Engine. This role suits candidates with a strong technical foundation, logical thinking, and a passion for developing innovative gameplay mechanics.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 


* Create engaging character designs with customizable outfits and accessories
* Design and implement water-themed and general environmental assets
* Develop smooth, high-quality character and object animations
* Create intuitive UI/UX elements and menu systems
* Design and implement dynamic water effects and weather systems



 Required Skills:
 


* Proficiency in 3D modeling software (Blender, Maya, or ZBrush)
* Experience with texturing tools (Substance Painter, Quixel Mixer)
* Strong knowledge of 2D art software (Photoshop, Procreate, or Krita)
* Familiarity with UI/UX design tools (Figma or Adobe XD)
* Animation expertise (Spine 2D, Maya, or Unreal Engine)



 Required Qualifications:
 


* Bachelor's degree in Game Design, Digital Arts, or related field
* Some experience in game art creation
* Strong portfolio demonstrating variety in art styles
* Experience with game engine implementation (preferably Unreal Engine)



  




* Join Us in Shaping the Future of Gaming
* 
* If you’re ready to unleash your creativity and take your skills to the next level, we’d love to hear from you!
* ### \*\*AI Developer\*\*



  





 What You’ll Gain
 



 This is more than just an internship; it’s a stepping stone into the gaming industry:
 


* The opportunity to directly contribute to the creation of immersive games.
* A chance to build your portfolio and enhance your resume with real-world projects.
* Insight into the creative processes at Realdini Studios, a leader in AI-driven game storytelling.



  





 Important Details
 


* This is an unpaid internship focused on skill enhancement and career development.
* Screening Question:
 *“Are you aware this is an unpaid internship focused on enhancing your skillset and resume?”*



  





 Join Us in Shaping the Future of Gaming
 


* We would love to hear from you if you’re ready to unleash your creativity and take your skills to the next level!

title: Software Developer - Autonomous Driving
description:
*Detta är en öppen ansökan för roller som kommer att bli tillgängliga med start under 2025.*
 Vill du jobba med utvecklingen av autonoma fordon? I samarbete med våra kunder har HiQ flera team i forskningsprojekt som utvecklar just det! Därför söker vi på HiQ efter kompetenta personer med olika erfarenheter som vill vara med och arbeta i framkant med utvecklingen av autonoma fordon.
   

  

 HiQ samarbetar redan idag med ett antal kunder och har flera team som arbetar inom industrin för autonoma och elektrifierade fordon. Det kan handla om förarlösa tåg eller elektrifierade tunga lastbilar samt sensor och navigationssystem för både båtar och flyg. Vi är involverade i utvecklingen av både komponenterna i fordonen och de som finns vid sidan av dem. En del av projekten har en internationell omfattning med hög säkerhetsklassning.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som gillar att grotta ner dig i komplexa problem. Du kommer att arbeta med seniora kollegor som har arbetat flera år inom det här området och som gillar att diskutera fram lösningar på de diverse problem som uppstår. Därför tror vi att det är bäst för helheten i projektet om du är trygg i din kompetens och har några års erfarenhet med dig in i rollen.
   

  

**Till dessa projekt är vi i behov av flera olika kompetenser:**
* Mjukvaruutvecklare inom C++ eller C# (gärna med erfarenhet av AWS eller Azure)
* Testautomatiserare med erfarenhet av Python
* DevOps
* Arkitekt med kunskap inom inbyggda system
* UX designer med erfarenhet från industrin


**Vi ser gärna att du utöver ovanstående också har:**
* Universitetsutbildning inom relevant område
* Erfarenhet eller starkt intresse för industribranschen
* Förståelse och möjlighet att göra dig förstådd på svenska
* Svenskt medborgarskap
* Plus i kanten om du också har B-körkort eller kanske till och med C-körkort!


 Känns det intressant men kanske inte riktigt rätt i tiden? Hör gärna av dig så kan vi prata mer och knyta kontakt för framtida möjligheter!

title: Principal Quantitative User Experience Researcher (Frontend) (Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. We aim to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you’re looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
 Through years of experience and a focused program of research, the Principal UX Researcher has established deep subject matter expertise in a domain, method or user group of strategic importance to the company. This subject matter expertise comes from practiced research excellence over an extended period of time, resulting in the Principal UX Researcher making him/herself into a key thought partner with impact widely felt across the company. Principal UX Researchers have exemplary breadth and depth of research skills, designing and conducting a variety of research programs that lead to insights, models and frameworks with a variety of broad applications (e.g., understanding industry trends, user needs, product-market fit, data structure needs, successful business strategy, etc.) Principal UX Researchers consistently deliver large impact on the business through insights that drive revenue, efficiencies or decision making.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Masters Degree or PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field.
* 12+ years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains.
* Expert in Quantitative research. (Log analysis, internal metrics triangulation, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* But, also has experience with Qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research.
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors.
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data.
* Ability to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* Is a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, product teams, designers, engineers, and other stakeholders. (in English)
* Enjoys collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven, and creative environment.


**Responsibilities:**
 General Role Expectations:
   

  

* Translates business problems into research projects and programs that go deep or wide across the business.
* Develops and delivers research insights answering key questions that deliver on multiple value propositions, informing internal stakeholders and other disciplines to make decisions at the company-, BU-, and Product-level. (e.g., priorities, product value proposition, product design, design process, market strategy, data frameworks, data needs, etc.)
* Leads end-to-end research activities (e.g., objectives, hypotheses, methodology, execution, findings, communication, ), both individually and by coordinated efforts over extended time periods.
* Collaborates regularly with Principals in other verticals to create processes and knowledge sharing that benefit the larger UX Research organization.


 Research Skills:
   

  

* Research approach; creating alignment considering the pros and cons of various research methodologies, techniques and tools for high quality craftsmanship and results to advance business objectives; providing advise on and pursuing research questions with a lack of alignment when the opportunity provides an impact to the business unavailable in the normal course of research.
* Ability to drive cross-functional collaboration via research insights/activities.
* Innovation on approach to primary research efforts, data triangulation and Research communication.
* Proven ability to lead a complex program of research that impacts multiple business areas.


 Communication & Collaboration:
   

  

* Collaborates and leads projects across all types of cross-functional groups – bringing the voice of consumers and partners.
* Shows excellent communication skills; tailored communication style for different audiences, concise and to the point. Is a role model for others in the organization on how to compile and share insights.
* Develops and implements agreed standards of research excellence across the organization. Institutes and participates in craft defining activities.

title: Senior Quantitative User Experience Researcher (Frontend) (Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. We aim to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you’re looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
 Senior UX Researchers have the breadth and depth of research method skills applicable to a wide range of questions, and over time develop standout areas of research excellence. A long track record and documented success in both research itself and achieving organizational impact is characteristic of Senior UX Researchers. The ability to integrate research into the work of colleagues in other roles makes the Senior UX Researcher effective and helps him/her achieve out-sized impact from research efforts. This ability, along with others that turn research into a strategic asset for Agoda’s decisions and processes, comes from a maturity in overall research approach emphasizing the highest benefit from all research investments.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Masters Degree or PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field
* 10+ years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains.
* Expert in Quantitative research. (Log analysis, internal metrics triangulation, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* But, also has experience with Qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research.
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors.
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data.
* Ability to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* Is a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, product teams, designers, engineers, and other stakeholders. (in English)
* Enjoys collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven, and creative environment.


**Responsibilities:**
 General Role Expectations:
   

  

* Conducts research end-to-end for high impact, leading stakeholders to the best collaboration with research for their goals
* Initiates research efforts serving Product Vertical goals in the medium- and long-term given a well-informed understanding of the business
* Formulates programmes of study and cumulative knowledge sharing relevant to the strategic objectives of their teams
* Leads projects that are collaborations with other stakeholders
* Accounts for the pros and cons of various research methodologies, and mentors others the use of techniques and tools for high-quality execution


 Research Skills:
   

  

* Expertise at evaluating research opportunities, particularly with ambiguous requests e.g. importance, urgency, and impact
* Ability to manage, challenge and shape inbound research requests, and propose solid research projects or programs
* Excellent project execution, while exploring alternate methods, mixed methods and innovative approaches
* Deep understands of the pros and cons of quantitative and qualitative research – and use of this knowledge to direct projects to appropriate methods
* Deep expertise in at least one domain (eg. Pricing), a user type (eg. Business traveler) or a method (eg. Diary Study), being the “go-to person” on the research team for this
* Triangulation of findings, methods, and theories within a project to ensure reliability and depth of insight
* Ability to maximize the value and efficiency of research by applying secondary research and expert inspection methods
* Solid knowledge of various software tools common in the field (e.g. for surveys, diary studies, analysis), and ability to apply the right tool to the problem
* Solid knowledge of GDPR, data compliance and ethics that is present in all of their activities


 Communication & Collaboration:
   

  

* Drives cross discipline/department collaboration via research insights/activities
* Collaborates efficiently with other researchers and other disciplines with clear commitment to shared ownership
* Shows excellent communication skills; tailored communication style for different audiences, concise and to the point, open to take input and feedback
* Contributes to the communication and implementation of agreed standards of research excellence across the organization


 #seattle #sanfrancisco #beijing #newyork #london #bangkok #singapore #chicago #hongkong #singapore #berlin #shanghai #losangeles #boston #austin #toronto #luxembourg #munich #oslo #copenhagen #stockholm #helsinki #brussels #hamburg #stuttgart #taipei #hamburg #stuttgart #dublin #telaviv #sydney #melbourne #perth #vancouver #montreal #prague #paris #dublin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #amsterdam #moscow #saintpetersburg #frankfurt #shenzhen #istanbul #dubai #kiev #seoul

title: Senior SAP Fiori Developers and Architects
Verksamhetschef till Medicinteknisk avdelning
description:
*Hälso- och sjukvården Region Blekinge*

Om oss


Blekingesjukhusets medicintekniska avdelning, MTA ansvarar för Regionens medicintekniska utrustning och verksamhet. Vi representerar även Regionen i medicintekniska frågor nationellt, i utredningar och som remissinstans.  

Blekingesjukhuset bedriver verksamhet i Karlskrona och i Karlshamn, MTA har medarbetare placerade på båda orterna.  

  

På medicintekniska avdelningen arbetar vi i nya moderna lokaler och hos oss får du möjlighet att göra skillnad i och med ditt nära samarbete med verksamheten!


I rekryteringen samverkar vi med nedan fackliga representanter som du når via växeln:  

Camilla Olsson, Vision
  

Ulla Sandgren, Kommunal
  

Elin Larsson, Vårdförbundet
  

Göran Mårdhed, Sveriges ingenjörer/ SACO


Om jobbet


Som verksamhetschef har du det övergripande ansvaret för verksamhet, personal, ekonomi och resultat. I rollen som verksamhetschef/ medicinteknisk chef ingår första linjens chefskap för verksamhetens 20 medarbetare. Medarbetargruppen består av ingenjörer, tekniker, medicinteknisk samordnare och kvalitetssamordnare.


Du leder och utvecklar verksamheten utifrån de mål, processer och ekonomiska ramar som ges. Inom dessa ramar har du som chef frihet och ansvar att arbeta för att utveckla en effektiv, kvalitativ och attraktiv verksamhet med en hållbar och stimulerande arbetsmiljö för medarbetarna samt säkerställa att verksamheten tillhandahåller och utför tjänster inom det medicintekniska området. Vidare ansvarar du även för de medicintekniska investeringarna och har delegation att genomföra upphandlingar upp till direktupphandlingsgränsen.


Du har löpande kontakt med vården och dess behov av stöd och du utvecklar arbetet i verksamheten i takt med den medicintekniska utvecklingen. Du sitter med i Medicinsk service ledningsgrupp samt representerar Medicinsk teknik i olika grupperingar. Uppdraget omfattar också att representera Region Blekinge i medicintekniska frågor på nationell nivå gentemot exempelvis andra regioner och myndigheter samt delta i olika forum. Representation sker även kopplat till medicintekniska frågor nationellt, i utredningar och som remissinstans.


Om dig


Vi söker dig som är som har en högskoleutbildning inom IT, medicinsk teknik, eller har annan utbildning och kvalifikationer som av arbetsgivaren bedöms likvärdiga. Det är meriterande om du har yrkeserfarenhet inom området medicinsk teknik så även om du har tidigare erfarenhet av att leda utifrån personal, ekonomi och verksamhetsansvar.
  

  

Vi värdesätter ett ledarskap som är närvarande och coachande och som innebär att stödja och tillvarata medarbetarens kunskap och kompetens, möjliggöra medarbetarnas ansvarstagande, lärande och delaktighet. Vi ser att du är, och vill vara, en närvarande ledare. Med din öppenhet, tydlighet och förmåga till dialog driver du verksamheten framåt. Du är mål- och resultatorienterad och har ett coachande förhållningssätt där du delegerar och ger våra medarbetare frihet under ansvar. Du kan verka inom givna ramar och bidra med nytänkande.
  

  

Arbetet innebär många sociala kontakter, såväl internt som externt, vilket ställer krav på god social kompetens och förmåga att bygga långsiktiga relationer. Mycket goda datakunskaper och kunskaper i svenska i tal och i skrift är ett krav för tjänsten. Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.


Region Blekinge krigsplacerar all tillsvidareanställd personal. Tjänsten som verksamhetschef är ett tidsbegränsat förordnande och kombineras med en tillsvidareanställning inom en grundprofession.


*Om Region Blekinge*


*Vi är 5 000 medarbetare som ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, tandvård, folkhälsa, regional tillväxt, infrastruktur, kollektivtrafik, kultur och bildning. Varje dag arbetar vi för att skapa livskvalitet för Blekinges invånare och växtkraft för länet. Tillsammans leder vi utvecklingen för ett attraktivt Blekinge och vi arbetar för att bidra till att göra Blekinge till den bästa livsmiljön för hållbar tillväxt och god hälsa.*

*Välkommen att göra skillnad tillsammans med oss - för att livet är viktigt!*

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan! Tack för att du ansöker via länken i annonsen. Vi undanber oss erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringstjänster i samband med den här annonsen.



Läs mer om Region Blekinge


**Anställningsform** Tillsvidareanställning
  

**Anställningens omfattning** Heltid
  

**Tillträde** Enligt överenskommelse
  

**Löneform** Individuell och differentierad lönesättning
  

**Antal lediga befattningar** 1
  

**Sysselsättningsgrad** 100 %
  

**Ort** Karlskrona
  

**Län** Blekinge län
  

**Land** Sverige
  

**Referensnummer** 2024/496
  

**Kontakt**
Maria Arvidsson Karlsson, 0455-731000  

**Publicerat** 2024-12-11
  

**Sista ansökningsdag** 2025-01-05
  

Dela länkar

title: Senior IT konsult inom digital transformation
description:
Vill du vara en nyckelspelare på våra kunders resa mot agil excellens och hållbara förändringar?


**Nyfiken? Klicka här!**Nu söker vi fler kollegor som vill vara med och bidra till innovativa och effektiva lösningar!
Hos **Stretch Amplify** höjer vi våra kunders digitala utvecklingsförmåga med både teknik och metodik. Som agil utvecklingspartner hjälper vi våra kunder att ta vara på all den teknik som finns tillgänglig runt omkring oss för att skapa framtidens digitala tjänster och produkter.
Om du motiveras av att arbeta i utmanande projekt med ny teknik och affärsutveckling i tätt samarbete med våra kunder och kollegor så kommer du trivas hos oss!
**Om dig**Du är en erfaren projektledare, verksamhetsutvecklare eller har haft en roll där du aktivt bidragit till att förändra och förbättra verksamheter. Att bygga förtroende, driva positiv förändring och skapa hållbara resultat är något som ligger dig varmt om hjärtat.
Som erfaren projektledare inom Digital Transformation kommer du att möta spännande utmaningar där du är med och formar både produkter och organisationer för framtidens utmaningar. Du fungerar som en katalysator för förändring, coachar team och ledare, och bidrar till att skapa en arbetskultur där innovation och samarbete frodas. Du navigerar skickligt i komplexa miljöer och använder din erfarenhet för att skapa verkligt värde för våra kunder.
**Saker vi vet är viktiga för att lyckas**
Du har lång erfarenhet från uppdrag och roller som Projektledare, Förändringsledare eller Verksamhetsutvecklare.
Du är nyfiken och har ett genuint intresse av att fortsätta utveckla dig själv, dina kollegor och våra kunder.
Du uppvisar ett lyhört och stödjande ledarskap som balanserar coachning med fokus på att uppnå uppsatta mål och ambitioner.
Du har full koll på både agila och traditionella metoder och ramverk – och vet av erfarenhet vad som fungerar när och varför.
**Vi erbjuder**
En flexibel arbetsplats
Konferenser – digitala, fysiska, interna och externa!
Arbete i en mix av in-house leveranser och externa leveranser
Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling – i nya projekt, team och kunder
Nära till beslut – dina idéer är värdefulla och de vill vi satsa på!

**Vilka blir dina Stretchkollegor?**
Vi har lite olika bakgrund, men gemensamt är att vi är problemlösare som trivs med komplicerade frågeställningar och utmaningar. Vi vet att mjukvara och produktutveckling är komplext och därför har vi lämnat förlegade arbetssätt bakom oss. Våra gemensamma värdeord är Nyfiken, Omtanke och Resultat – vilket vi exemplifierar i våra uppdrag hos kund såväl som internt.
**Om Stretchgruppen**
Vi tror på alla människors vilja och förmåga att utveckla en bättre värld. Och att vi har ett kollektivt ansvar att skapa hållbara lösningar, för en bättre framtid för oss och kommande generationer. Vi kallar det för hållbart entreprenörskap.
Våra bolag erbjuder IT-tjänster och produkter som skapar starkare och tydligare affärsvärde. Varje bolag har sin egen väldefinierade marknad där kundernas digitalisering står i centrum.
Läs mer oss och våra värderingar på **Om Stretchgruppen - Stretch**  

**Stretchgruppen**
**Stretch Amplify**
**Roll**
Projektledare
**Platser**
**Malmö, Stora Nygatan 61**
**Distansarbete**
Hybridarbete
**KONTAKT**


**Sofie Havgård**
Stretch Ability
company_description: Stretch gör skillnad genom att ha affärsvärde i fokus, leveransförmåga i toppklass och entreprenörskap i vårt DNA. Dessutom har vi riktigt roligt när vi jobbar tillsammans. Följ med oss!

title: Data Consultant – IT
description:
### **Assignment Description**


* Advanced Business Analyst who has profound experience in doing data Analysis using SQL. Knowing SAS/Python is an added advantage.
* Well versed and comfortable in handling Huge Datasets.
* Good Analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Should be able to understand the Business terminologies and act as a very good barrier between Business and IT development team.
* Added advantage to have Functional background around Credit Risk.
* Independently Convert the Business requirements into High level and low-level Solution design.
* Should be able to support in UT, ST and end-to-end UAT testing.
* Added advantage in creating functional test cases and validating the results.
* It is very important to have good communication skills and an agile team player.
* Minimum 8-10 years of IT experience and minimum 3-4 years of Analyst experience, overall 5 years of Data Analyst experience.

description:

Emagine is now looking for a Data Engineer (Hadoop skillset) to one of our banking clients.

**End date:** 2025-06-30

We are looking for a skilled Data Engineers with Hadoop skillset.  

Able to work independently with defined problems on a highly-complex level within certain areas of expertise.  

Experience with and ability to take partial responsibility for technically complex projects. Very good knowledge of relevant tools and technology

 **Description of knowledge and experience**

* Needs to have experience in Hadoop Cloudera distribution (MUST HAVE)
* Needs to have experience in Docker/Kubernetes platforms
* Needs to have experience in Oracle or any relational database
* Should have experience in setting the CICD pipelines
* Should be strong in Spark, Scala, Big data technologies
* Should have experience in Unix Shell scripting
* Good to have working experience in Oozie scheduler or any other job/workflow scheduler
* Good to have experience in Elastic search cluster
* Nice to have working in Quantexa Academy certification
* Nice to have working experience in Quantexa projects
