title: FinOps Engineer
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will be part of the Cloud Governance team. We are a small central team supporting several business units. Our focus is FinOps, cloud security and cloud management. Your role will be centered around the FinOps phases of Inform, Optimize and Operate. You will be expected to be grounded in FinOps but there are no set boundaries between competence areas. "Not in my job description" is not in our vocabulary. You will be expected to both invent and execute. We are pioneering FinOps in Sinch. As a consequence, not all requirements will come from above. Sometimes we need to work backwards, i. e. to define our own requirements and align with stakeholders rather than having requirements handed to us.
   

  

 It is important that you understand the mechanisms that drive cloud cost. Depending on who you are the, the role can be weighted more towards technology or finance.
   

  

**As Our New FinOps Engineer You Will**
* As a bridge that connects Finance and Technology, the FinOps Engineer should be able to explain cloud technology to finance and management personas and finance to engineers.
* Promote FinOps culture across the company
* Enable cost visibility - tagging and reporting
* Identify, recommend and follow up cost optimization opportunities and drive cost optimization workshops (gamedays)
* Build and maintain relationship with customers and internal stakeholders; interact with engineers, executives, product managers and finance teams
* Work with cloud vendors
* Take ownership of FinOps cost tools and develop capacity reservation policies
* Support budget processes - Be a cost detective, perform Cost analysis deep-dives and create custom reports
* Buy reserved capacity
* Work on technical solutions to support FinOps
* Advise on cost effective architectures
* Work on anything else you can come up with to help Sinch excel in FinOps!


**Requirements**
* Already a FinOps practitioner or a Finance person with a tech interest or a Cloud/DevOps Engineer wanting to take the next step.
* You have a solid understanding of networking, storage, compute, application s up port, and application development concepts as it pertains to cloud computing
* Possess 5+ years of experience in Cloud Cost Management, FinOps or Vendor Client Success Management; having multi-year Multi year experience with Azure, AWS and/or GCP.
* Curious and inventive, problem solver, self-motivated
* University degree preferred
* Willing to be FinOps certified
* Passionate and comfortable handling FinOps discussions at the technical, business or financial level
* Adaptable and flexible with workloads and priorities
* Strong interpersonal skills /collaboration skills - to ensure progress is made
* Good written documentation and communication skills
* Possess Foundational Cloud services knowledge


**Good to have**
* Previous experience of FinOps
* FinOps Practitioner certification
* Certification on one or more cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure); such as AWS Cloud Practitioner, Azure Fundamentals, GCP Foundational
* Experience in an Agile environment using Scrum methodology
* Experience with chargeback modeling, cost savings and avoidance tracking, and forecasting
* Two or more (2+) years' experience with cost optimization


 Embrace the challenge and join us!
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Cloud Engineer Level D
description:
Job Title: Cloud Engineer Level D
   

  

 Company: main Swedish railway company
   

  

 Max Price Rate: 619 SEK/h
   

  

 Location: Stockholm
   

  

 Start Date: 2025-01-01
   

  

 End Date (renewable): 2025-12-31
   

  

 We are seeking a skilled professional with expertise in designing, implementing, and maintaining cloud infrastructure and solutions. As a Cloud Infrastructure Architect, you will be responsible for creating scalable and resilient cloud architectures aligned with business objectives and best practices. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to provision and manage cloud resources, optimize performance, ensure security and compliance, and drive continuous improvement and optimization. Your role will also involve troubleshooting and issue resolution, disaster recovery planning, incident response, and cloud governance.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Designing and Implementing Cloud Architecture: Develop scalable and resilient cloud architectures aligned with business objectives and best practices.
* Infrastructure Provisioning and Management: Provision and configure virtual machines, storage solutions, networking resources, and other cloud infrastructure components.
* Cloud Performance Tuning: Fine-tune cloud infrastructure and applications to optimize performance and responsiveness.
* Continuous Improvement and Optimization: Continuously assess the effectiveness of cloud solutions, identify areas for improvement, and propose innovative ideas to enhance performance, reliability, and security.
* Cloud Security and Compliance: Implement robust security measures to safeguard cloud-based assets, including data encryption, access controls, and network security configurations.
* Monitoring and Performance Optimization: Monitor cloud resources, system metrics, and application performance to identify bottlenecks, optimize resource utilization, and improve overall system efficiency.
* Cloud Monitoring and Alerting: Implement robust monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and resolve issues within the cloud infrastructure.
* Backup and Disaster Recovery Planning: Develop and implement backup and disaster recovery strategies to ensure data resilience and business continuity.
* Disaster Recovery Testing: Plan and execute regular disaster recovery testing to validate the effectiveness of recovery procedures and ensure business continuity.
* Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: Diagnose and resolve cloud-related issues, including network connectivity, performance bottlenecks, and service disruptions.
* Incident Response and Disaster Mitigation: Develop incident response plans and procedures to handle cloud-related incidents and implement proactive measures to mitigate potential risks.
* Cloud Governance and Policy Management: Develop and enforce governance frameworks, policies, and procedures to ensure adherence to regulatory requirements, data privacy standards, and internal security protocols.


**Requirements**
* Demonstrated expertise in working with popular cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, GCP
* Proficiency in infrastructure automation using tools like Bicep or Terraform
* In-depth understanding of networking concepts and cloud-specific networking services
* Proficiency in containerization technologies like Docker and container orchestration platforms such as Kubernetes or AKS
* Expertise in monitoring cloud environments and troubleshooting issues efficiently
* Knowledge of cloud-based database technologies and proficiency in database administration
* Understanding of DevOps methodologies and related tools such as Jenkins, Git, or Azure DevOps
* Strong teamwork and communication skills
* A growth mindset with a passion for learning new technologies
* Hands-on experience in cloud migration and performance optimization

title: Test Automation Engineer
description:
Flightradar24 is one of the most successful growth-stage tech companies in Stockholm. Each day, more than 4 million aviation enthusiasts use our app or website, and we have many of the biggest names in aviation as business customers.
   

  

 The position requires that you are able to work from our office in Stockholm, Sweden. Relocation is not offered for this role.
   

  

 Flightradar24 is looking for a skilled Test Automation Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing automated test cases for our products . The candidate must have experience working with automation of APIs (REST and gRPC), Backend Testing and the ability to work with cross-platform teams to set up CI/CD pipelines. The candidate must also be able to work independently and identify opportunities for automated testing improvements across teams.
   

  

 What you’ll do
   

  

* Test Automation & Framework Development:
+ Design, develop, and maintain scalable automated test frameworks.
+ Implement robust automated scripts for functional and regression testing of APIs and Webservices.

* API Automation & Performance Testing:
+ Create and execute test strategies, plans, and cases to ensure high-quality releases of APIs.
+ Conduct performance and load tests, analyze results, and communicate findings effectively.

* Continuous Integration & Delivery:
+ Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline to support rapid, reliable releases.
+ Collaborate with teams to optimize testing workflows and maintain high code quality.

* Collaboration & Communication:
+ Partner closely with developers, product managers, and QA peers to define testing requirements.
+ Working closely with backend teams.
+ Communicate test results, defects, and quality metrics to both technical and non-technical audiences.
+ Participate in code reviews, design discussions, and agile ceremonies.


 Who you are
   

  

* Skilled in building and maintaining API test automation frameworks (e.g.,Karate, REST Assured, Pytest, etc..)
+ Experienced with performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, Gatling)
+ Knowledgeable in CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps)
+ Proficient in at least one programming language (e.g., Java, Python, JavaScript)
+ Excellent communicator, adept at conveying complex ideas to diverse audiences
+ Strong collaborator who thrives in cross-functional, distributed team environments
+ Detail-oriented problem solver with a proactive approach


**About Flightradar24**
 With over 4 million daily users, Flightradar24 is the world’s most popular flight tracking service. Our app regularly tops the App Store and Google Play Travel charts. We also offer a wide range of commercial services, and our customers include many of the biggest names in aviation.
   

  

 We're constantly adding new services and improving existing products. To help us meet those challenges, we're looking for creative, collaborative, and tech-savvy applicants to join us.
   

  

 Benefits of working at Flightradar24 include:
   

  

* Opportunity to impact a service with millions of end users from all around the world
* Flexible and social work environment with free beverages, fruit, and snacks
* Modern office in the heart of beautiful downtown Stockholm, Sweden
* Being part of a diverse team with +30 nationalities and 6 continents represented with English being our main language


 Flightradar24 started as a hobby project in 2006 when two Swedish aviation geeks decided to build a network of ADS-B receivers in Northern and Central Europe. In 2009 we opened up the network, and made it possible for anyone with an ADS-B receiver to upload data to the network. Many parts of the world were quickly covered, but the quest to provide global ADS-B coverage is still ongoing.
   

  

**Flightradar24 at a glance**
* Largest ADS-B network in the world with over 40,000 connected receivers
* 4+ million users per day
* 50+ million app downloads

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer - Health tech
description:
**Senior Infrastructure Engineer**
 Platform24 is on a mission to unlock healthcare's potential by creating smooth and accessible healthcare where patients and caregivers are empowered by the most intelligent technology available. Our infrastructure is the backbone that makes this possible, ensuring our solutions are secure, scalable, and reliable for healthcare professionals across Europe 🏥.
   

  

 We're looking for a Senior Infrastructure Engineer to join our mission of revolutionizing healthcare delivery. In this role, you'll be instrumental in building and maintaining the robust technical foundation that powers our innovative healthcare solutions 💪.
   

  

**You Will, In This Role, Be**
* Design, implement, and maintain our Kubernetes-based infrastructure 🔄
* Drive infrastructure automation using Terraform and other IaC tools ⚡
* Support our compliance efforts with MDR, ISO27001, and SOC2 requirements 🔒
* Lead and contribute to our cloud migration strategy and implementation 🚀
* Implement and maintain robust monitoring, alerting, and logging systems 📊
* Maintain and improve CI/CD pipelines using GitLab 🔄
* Design and implement GitLab pipeline templates and shared configurations 🛠️
* Collaborate with development teams to improve deployment processes and infrastructure reliability 🤝
* Manage and optimize our message queues, monitoring solutions, and database systems.


**Our Tech Stack**
 We work with modern technologies including Kubernetes, MySQL, Prometheus, Grafana, Elastic Stack, ActiveMQ, Terraform, and GitLab - all carefully selected to build secure and scalable healthcare solutions 🔧.
   

  

 We are using a Swedish hosting provider with planned expansion to a US public cloud.
   

  

**We're Looking For Someone With** 
  

  

* 5+ years of experience in infrastructure engineering or DevOps roles
* Strong hands-on experience with:
+ Kubernetes cluster management and administration
+ Infrastructure as Code using Terraform
+ Monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
+ Configuration management tools (Ansible, Chef, or similar)
+ ELK stack for logging and analysis
+ Proficiency in scripting languages like Python or Bash

* Public cloud experience (Azure, GCP, or AWS)
* Solid understanding of network security and infrastructure hardening
* Message queue systems like ActiveMQ or similar
* Excellent problem-solving skills
* Fluency in English; Swedish language skills are a plus


**Nice To Have**
* Experience from regulated industries, especially healthcare 🏥
* Knowledge of healthcare software regulations (MDR) and security standards (SOC2, 27001)📜


**What's In It For You**
* Be part of shaping the future of healthcare technology 🌟
* Work with cutting-edge technologies in a purpose-driven environment 💻
* Flexible hybrid work arrangement (2-3 days in office) 🏢
* Regular Demos to celebrate our achievements 🍻
* Comprehensive benefits package and work culture perks 🌈
* Five workdays annually for voluntary work to help others ❤️


 Join us in Stockholm and work alongside intelligent, friendly, and skilled colleagues from around the world 🌍. We conduct ongoing interviews, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible!
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment decisions are based on qualifications, merit, and business needs 🤝.
   

  

 Note: We do not offer relocation support but support work permits if you are already in Sweden on a work permit, student Visa or EU blue card, or similar.
   

  

 Platform24 develops system support for cohesive digital care chains that facilitate increased accessibility, efficiency and medical security. We are the largest company in the Nordic region when it comes to automatic triage for directing patients to the right level of care and the right care unit, even in complex flows along the entire patient pathway.
   

  

 Our customers include healthcare regions, private care providers, and insurance companies.

title: Atlassian/DevOps-specialist
description:
**Vi söker nu efter en Atlassian/DevOps-specialist till vår kund inom tillverkande industri.** 




  





**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Uppdraget innebär att delta som medlem i ett team med ansvar för att sätta upp och operera bland annat Atlassians verktyg on-premise.
* Mer information om uppdraget förmedlas om man går vidare i urvalet.



  





**Skallkrav:** 



* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med Atlassians on-premise verktyg.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i både tal och skrift.



  





**Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm
 



**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid på plats i kundens lokaler.
 



**Start:** 
 Februari 2025, väldigt långsiktigt uppdrag med god möjlighet till direktanställning hos kunden i senare skede.
 



  





**Information:** 



* ***Säkerhetsprövning och registerkontroll utförs på kundens begäran.***
* ***Ansök senast 2024-12-18.***
* ***Urval av kandidater sker löpande och annonsen kan tas bort tidigare.***



  





**Om Agiremus** 




 Sedan 2015 har vi hjälpt flertalet medarbetare att komma ut på arbetsmarknaden samt att nå sina karriärmål runtom i Sverige. Genom att skapa och bibehålla meningsfulla relationer med våra samarbetspartners kan vi presentera en bred rad av arbetsmarknadens mest attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för våra medarbetare och kandidater. Agiremus verkar inom de flesta branscherna, både inom privat och offentlig sektor.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder:
 



 Agiremus erbjuder dig som konsult en spännande och utmanande arbetsplats där du ges möjlighet att utvecklas inom din roll. Vi bryr oss om dig som och strävar efter långsiktiga samarbeten. Som konsult hos oss ges du, förutom spännande uppdrag, möjlighet att dela din resa med andra konsulter. Med jämna mellanrum anordnar vi tillfällen för er att träffas genom olika aktiviteter. Självklart kommer du även att ha en engagerad kontaktperson hos oss som finns där som bollplank och stöd. Vi erbjuder dig även goda personalförmåner som:
 



  




* Anställning med fast månadslön.
* Semester enligt semesterlagen.
* Tjänstepension.
* Heltäckande sjuk och olycksfallsförsäkring dygnet runt, årets alla dagar.
* Friskvårdsbidrag m.m.



  





 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Data Platform Engineer
description:
**Rollen:**
 Projektet syftar till att utöka datat i nuvarande plattform som byggs på Azure med hjälp av Databricks. Över tid ska även en Data Science miljö etableras och all nödvändig analys göras här.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning**
 Vi söker en erfaren Data Platform Engineer som kan bygga lösningar på Azure med Databricks och kan utveckla och hjälpa teamet inom Dev-Ops-området. Vår organisation är liten, så man behöver ta stort eget ansvar.
   

  

**Ska-krav:**
* Kunskap i Azure infrastruktur för dataplattformar
* Kunskap/Erfarenhet av utveckling i Python
* Erfarenhet av uppsättning av cloud-infrastruktur för data teams
* Erfarenhet av Data Engineering och datamodellering
* Erfarenhet av Python Erfarenhet av implementering av Databricks
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade releaseprocesser och DevOps
* Erfarenhet av utveckling agil utveckling i praktiken


**Meriterande:**
* Power BI eller annat visualiseringsverktyg


**Var god förklara hur du uppfyller alla kraven.**
**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Ort:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Period** 
 : 07-01-2025-31-07-2025
   

  

**Sista ansökningdag: 13-12-2024**
*Vi presenterar löpande. Om du är intresserad av ett uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.*

title: Backend Software Engineer (.Net Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
* Create systems that are not only scalable but also resilient, ensuring graceful failure.
* Manage the software lifecycle from design and development to testing and production deployment.
* Work with a range of different technologies and programming languages, but primarily with C# and .NET Core.
* Actively contribute to enhancing our development processes and pipelines.
* Take a hands-on approach to monitoring production environments, identifying issues, and being on-call when necessary.
* Engage closely with software engineers, architects, DevOps specialists, and product managers to deliver exceptional products.


**Requirements**
* Experienced professional in team-based development, deployment, and maintenance of software products in production.
* In-depth knowledge of .NET Core and a deep passion for technology.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Ability to work effectively within a cross-functional self-organizing team, fostering collaboration and mutual respect among team members.
* A passion for writing clean and testable code.
* Bachelor's degree in computer science or related technical discipline.


**Good to have**
* Experience in a similar industry or related one.
* Experience working with service-oriented architecture and distributed systems.
* Experience with Kubernetes or similar technologies.
* Experience working with AWS.
* Proven ability to work with others to solve tough technical problems.
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment characteristic of agile development methodologies.
* Experience guiding and mentoring fellow developers empowering them to contribute effectively to team goals.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: AWS Databricks Architect
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
Cognizant is a global leader within Information Technology Services (Fortune 500 since 2011). The company was founded in 1994, and the Head Quarters is still in USA. Cognizant, which was originally Dun & Bradstreets own inhouse bureau, serves the market with vertical solutions for digital automation (cloud, AI, IoT and analytics). Cognizant operates in industries like Health Care, Life Science, Banking and Finance, Insurance, Retail, Production, Logistics, Energy etc and is a key player within the Digital revolution. Cognizant Global has a revenue of USD 17 billion and nearly 300 000 employees. To strengthen the Nordic team within Artificial Intelligence & Analytics SME Team, Cognizant is now looking to hire a: AWS/AZURE Databricks Architect – lead, Cognizant Nordics.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Are you interested in working in a global company helping market-leading clients solve strategic data and analytical challenges? Can you see yourself in a diverse environment where your daily work consists of global collaborations across industries and professions? Then you might be the one we are looking to hire for our Artificial Intelligence and Analytics Advisory SME team. At Cognizant you get the dynamic and entrepreneurial freedom of a small organization, yet the professionalism and long-term sustainability of a large organization. We are a small Nordic practice with aggressive growth ambitions. We are agile enough to engage with clients on their most strategic initiatives and have the knowhow and financial strength to deliver the most challenging change programs. “Engineering Modern business to improve everyday life “ is Cognizant’s agenda to solve business problems such as monitoring CO2 emission in logistics for sustainability, solutions for anti-money laundering in banking and Data-driven transparency in manufacturing. Our SME practice is rated leader by Forrester (AI consulting firms report).
   

  

**About The Role**
 The AWS /AZURE Databricks Architect – lead role requires good skills in the development of data engineering solutions using various services required for data architecture on Databricks delta lake, streaming, AZURE, AWS, ETL Development, and data modelling. Understanding of Data Warehouse and Data Lakehouse paradigms.
   

  

**AWS/AZURE Databricks Architect – Lead Include**
* Own the design and implementation of scalable and secure solutions using Databricks and AWS or AZURE
* Be responsible for the development and deployment of data pipelines and workflows to ensure efficient data processing.
* Collaborate with multi-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
* Ensure the architecture aligns with industry standard processes and regulatory requirements.
* Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.
* Monitor system performance and implement vital adjustments to maintain optimal functionality.
* Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the architecture.
* Engage with customers and principal architects understand the business requirements and build AWS or Azure cloud big data platform and solutions


**About You**
 Professionally, you have a university degree in business administration, engineering or related field. We think that you have 2-3 years’ experience in Consulting or relevant project experience with premier organization(s).
   

  

 We also believe you have a strong experience in developing data lakes, and datamarts on the Databricks platform. Furthermore, strong skill sets in AWS Data Lake services such as - AWS Glue, S3 Lambda, SNS, IAM, and skills Spark, Python, and SQL. Or Microsoft Azure – Pureview and Fabric experience.
   

  

 You are used to working with global and regional clients on a senior and preferably executive level. You are experienced in delivering strategy definitions and/or Artificial intelligence and analytics transformation programs across industry sectors and in different client contexts.
   

  

 For this role you need to be fluent in English and one of the Nordics Languages (Swedish, Norwegian, Danish or Finnish).
   

  

 Personally, you have strong interpersonal and leadership skills and an entrepreneurial mindset, as you like to creatively explore and contribute to continuous improvements. You are a doer and can proactively identify, prioritize, qualify and convert opportunities. We think that you are a genuine leader, characterized by integrity, creativity, accountability, communication and respect. We believe that hard work can go hand in hand with an informal and collaboratively work culture.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
* Become part of a ‘flag ship’ success story
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone
* Open, ‘can do’ team spirit
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality
* Drive your own career.

title: Cyber Security Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Expleo** 
 is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Senior DevSecOps Consultant** 
 to join our team in
 **Sweden** 
 (located in Gothenburg OR Stockholm).
   

  

 Our
 **ideal** 
 candidate has strong problem-solving skills, an analytical mindset and the ability to lead the integration of security into the development and operations processes.
   

  

 If you are a full-stack engineer looking to expand your skill set, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team today and take the next step in your career!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* DevSecOps Strategy Implementation : Support and implement a comprehensive DevSecOps strategy that aligns with organizational objectives and security standards.
* CI/CD Pipeline Security Integration : Integrate security tools and practices within CI/CD pipelines to automate security checks and ensure continuous security compliance.
* Security Automation and Orchestration : Design and implement security automation scripts and workflows to enhance the efficiency of the DevSecOps process.
* Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Security: Ensure security best practices are embedded in IaC scripts and configurations.
* Container and Microservices Security : Implement security measures for containerized applications and microservices architectures.
* Collaboration and Training : Work collaboratively with development and operations teams to build a strong DevSecOps culture; provide training and mentorship in security best practices.


**Qualifications**
* Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in DevSecOps, with a proven track record of implementing security in DevOps environments.
* Expertise in automation and orchestration tools (e.g., Jenkins, Ansible, Chef, Puppet).
* Proficient in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP) and understanding of cloud-native security principles.
* Good knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes) and their security configurations.
* Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation) and ensuring the security of IaC.
* Proficient in implementing and configuring security tools such as SAST, DAST, IAST, RASP, and vulnerability scanners.
* Familiarity with secure coding practices and application security standards.
* Strong understanding of network and application security, threat modeling, risk assessment techniques, and cybersecurity frameworks (e.g., OWASP, NIST).
* Knowledge of compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).


**Benefits**
**Who are we?**
 Expleo is a rapidly growing consulting company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions in the fields of AI engineering, digitalization, hyper-automation, cybersecurity, and data science. With a strong commitment to integrity, diversity, sustainability, and societal security, Expleo is at the forefront of creating a better future. Join our dynamic team and be part of our journey to shape the future of technology and business.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
* Collaborative working environment – we stand shoulder to shoulder with our clients and our peers through good times and challenges
* We empower all passionate technology loving professionals by allowing them to expand their skills and take part in inspiring projects
* Expleo Academy - enables you to acquire and develop the right skills by delivering a suite of accredited training courses
* Always working as one team, our people are not afraid to think big and challenge the status quo
* Collective agreement with the union
* Access to a collection of benefits and discounted prices on services and shops.
* Health benefits
* Expleo team activities


 "We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age ”.

title: Continuous Delivery Lead
description:
Are you a passionate Continuous Delivery advocate and practitioner, who is looking to help accelerate the software delivery and operational performance of a large inhouse development project? If so, then join the team that is responsible for building and operating
 *Waypoint* 
 , our company's largest core insurance system. Waypoint is crucial to managing the operations and processes involved in creating and maintaining insurance policies.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As Continuous Delivery Lead, you will help uncover, and lead our software delivery organization along the path towards high performance, while maintaining and even improving quality and operational stability at the same time.
   

  

 You will collaborate closely with developers, devOps engineers, QA engineers and our internal platform team to build a shared CI/CD vision and define the steps forward. You will play a leading role in convincing stakeholders of the benefits of this journey, and in driving the changes that are necessary to move forward.
   

  

**We offer**
 Just as we set high standards for you as an employee, we also expect you to set high standards for us as an employer. Here are some of the benefits of working at If:
   

  

* An inclusive work environment where everyone is welcome
* Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics
* Social activities, as well as highly skilled professional environment
* Possibility of hybrid workplace
* Health promoting workplace with e.g., wellness allowance and various sports activities
* Great insurance benefits
* High pension savings


**About The Team**
 We have built our digital platform, Waypoint, from scratch—a unified solution for all services and business areas, utilizing modern technology. Waypoint is one of the Nordic region's largest .NET products. Every day, we focus on finding smarter solutions for our customers and ourselves. Our team comprises over 150 people working together in interdisciplinary and autonomous teams to deliver a stable, scalable, and secure insurance platform. Waypoint is a complex and exciting system, continuously in need of skilled and committed individuals. This is where you come in.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You live and breathe the principles of Continuous Delivery and DevOps and you never stop learning about this exciting field. You are passionate about improving Software Delivery and Operational performance through cultural improvements and the application of modern engineering practices. You have seen it working at scale and you can advocate the benefits to engineers and business stakeholders alike. You are able to plot a path from our current situation to a better one, to measure progress along the journey, and to help drive the organization forward. You can get into the details with engineers and even roll up your sleeves to help put it together when needed.
   

  

 You also have:
   

  

* Extensive experience working with CI/CD tools, such as Git, Octopus Deploy, Azure DevOps and TeamCity.
* Experience with source control tools and methods, such as trunk-based development and Gitflow.
* Experience in controlled rollout, using techniques and tools such as canary, A/B and blue/green deployments, and feature flags.
* Experience with infrastructure automation and GitOps is a bonus.
* Fluency in English - both orally and in written.


**Additional Facts And Recruitment Process**
**Application deadline:** 
 Screening and interviewing will start immediately. However, application deadline is 31st of December 2024.
   

**To apply for the position:** 
 Please attach both your CV and answer the questions in the application form.
   

**Work location:** 
 Oslo or Stockholm.
   

  

**For more information,** 
 please contact John Muncey, Waypoint Tribe Tech Lead, john.muncey@if.no.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**About Us**
  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.**
 To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Fullstack-utvecklare (Java)
description:
Vi på HiQ söker nu en erfaren Java-utvecklare till vårt team som vill vara med och skapa innovativa och användarvänliga lösningar för våra kunder. I denna roll kommer du att fokusera på backend-utveckling med Java och bidra till projekt som gör verklig skillnad för samhället. Du kommer att vara en del av ett kompetent team där du får stor möjlighet att påverka utvecklingen av framtidens digitala tjänster.
   

  

**Din roll:**
 Som Java-utvecklare kommer du att arbeta främst med backend-utveckling, men även ha möjlighet att bidra med frontend-kompetens när det behövs. Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Backend: Java (Spring, Spring Boot)
* Frontend: Meriterande om du har erfarenhet av React.js, Vue.js eller Angular
* Molnlösningar: AWS, GCP eller Azure


 Du kommer att delta i hela utvecklingsprocessen från design och utveckling till test och driftsättning, samt bidra med tekniska lösningar och innovationer.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar
* God kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska


**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes och CI/CD-pipelines


**Varför HiQ?**
 På HiQ får du chansen att arbeta i ett dynamiskt och innovativt team där vi värderar din tekniska kompetens och din förmåga att samarbeta. Vi erbjuder en öppen och utvecklande miljö där du får stora möjligheter att växa och lära dig nya teknologier.
   

  

 Hos oss får du arbeta med samhällsbärande projekt inom offentlig sektor som bidrar till att forma Sveriges framtid. Vi utvecklar system för allt från finansiella tjänster och energisäkerhet till digitala plattformar som gör vardagen bättre för medborgarna.
   

  

**Ansök nu!**
 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär som Java-utvecklare? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt team som bygger morgondagens digitala lösningar!

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
**Position Summary** 




 As a Senior Software Developer at Tacton, you’ll contribute to building innovative and robust software solutions that power our renowned Configure, Price, and Quote (CPQ) product. In this role, you’ll leverage your technical expertise to create solutions that meet the needs of global manufacturers. With many exciting changes underway, Tacton offers opportunities to take on new challenges and responsibilities.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Develop and Deliver:** 
 Design and implement scalable, robust applications using primarily Java and JavaScript with an occasional side of C++ and C#/.Net for specific projects.
* **Collaborate Across Teams:** 
 Work closely with Product Managers, Architects, and other stakeholders to ensure deliveries are aligned with both technical and business objectives.
* **Maintain and Enhance:** 
 Continuously improve existing systems, enhancing functionality and addressing technical debt.
* **Document and Communicate:** 
 Clearly describe and document software solutions for team members and stakeholders.
* **Encourage Collaboration and Positivity:** 
 Join a senior, supportive team environment that fosters collaboration, creativity, and a forward-thinking mindset.



  





**Requirements** 




 We are looking for a skilled software developer with over 5 years of experience in building and maintaining high-quality software products. You should have a strong background in Java, with the ability to develop scalable backend solutions, and the flexibility to contribute across the stack, including frontend technologies.
 



  




* Expertise in Java development
* Proven ability to transform functional needs into successful solutions
* Independent and self-managed work style
* Experience in SaaS product development and cloud technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker, and AWS
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken



  





**Preferred:** 



* Experience with test automation.
* Knowledge of SQL, .Net, and C# (beneficial for certain projects).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
* Strong communication skills



  





**The recruitment process consists of:** 



* Screening call with Talent Acquisition
* First interview with our hiring manager
* Technical interview
* Interview with our CPO
* Reference check



  





**What We Offer** 




 At Tacton, you’ll have the opportunity to grow your career in a global organization that values teamwork and individual development. Working with cutting-edge technology, we tackle complex challenges in the manufacturing industry. We offer flexible working conditions, knowledge-sharing, and a culture built on mutual respect and collaboration.
 



  





**Our Culture and Why You Belong** 




 Collaborative, Engaged, Trustworthy, Customer-Oriented, Visionary—if these values resonate with you, we’d love to hear from you!
 



  





 At Tacton, we celebrate diversity and strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome. Our team consists of people from all over the world, and we believe this diversity makes us stronger.
 



  





 As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we’re committed to fostering an environment where everyone can thrive. With our comprehensive onboarding program, you’ll be set up for success from day one.
 



 We look forward to your application—apply soon as we review candidates on a rolling basis.
 



  





**About Tacton** 




*Tacton is a leading Software as a Service company trusted by global manufacturers. We got started in the late 1990’s when six computer scientists figured out a revolutionary way to help Manufacturers overcome their most business-critical, product configuration challenges. Since those early days, we have grown to support global manufacturers seeking to thrive in a changing world.* 




*We invite you to find out more about us @ www.tacton.com/about*

title: Senior .NET utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Utveckling och förvaltning av lösningar på .NET-plattformen.
* Aktivt deltagande i teamarbete enligt SAFe-ramverket.
* Bidra med teknisk expertis i övergången från legacy-system till moderna arkitekturer.
* Säkerställa robusthet, säkerhet och regulatorisk efterlevnad i utvecklade lösningar.


**Din profil (Skall krav)** 
  

  

* Erfarenhet av:
+ C#, .NET Core eller ASP.NET.
+ Entity Framework och Microsoft SQL Server.
+ Responsiv webb, HTML, CSS, Javascript och front-end-ramverk som React.
+ Utveckling av API:er enligt API-first-principen.
+ Design av moderna arkitekturstilar, exempelvis mikrotjänster.

* Kunskap om:
+ Relevanta ramverk och plattformsteknologier för produktionssättning.
+ Infrastruktur som kod och moderna verktyg för källkodshantering, exempelvis GitLab eller Azure DevOps.
+ Privacy & security by design för säkerhetskritiska system.

* Erfarenhet av:
+ Arbete i stora organisationer med standardiserade metoder.
+ Hantering av olika databaser.
+ Testfall och testhantering.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av Azure.
* Använt AI, exempelvis CoPilot, som en aktiv del av systemutvecklingen.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 15-12-2024
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Developer - Dynamics 365
description:
10% of Europe’s CO₂ emissions are caused by residential heating and energy bills are out of control. Aira is here to change that.
   

  

 With our intelligent Aira Heat Pump at the heart, we’re making the switch to clean energy-tech easier and more affordable. Helping Europe turn off gas and slashing energy costs one home at a time.
   

  

 Founded in 2022, and with 1000+ employees and counting, Aira is driving the clean energy revolution by providing homes with modern clean energy-tech solutions such as solar power, battery storage solutions and heat pumps. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Poland, an HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, and hubs across the UK, Germany and Italy, Aira is well on track to install clean energy-tech into 5 million homes by 2034.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a talented Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain Developer to join our dedicated team of 5 domain experts. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in driving new developments, optimising platform performance, and ensuring seamless integrations. Your expertise will be essential in keeping Aira agile and adaptable as we continue our rapid growth.
   

  

 Join us at Aira and play a crucial role in driving forward our platform’s development and integration, contributing to the success of a dynamic and growing business.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Drive development, technical upgrades to ensure the smooth operation of Dynamics 365 F&O.
* Create and manage integrations with internal systems and external partners.
* Oversee seamless deployment, delivery, and integration of Dynamics 365 with other system components and infrastructure.
* Manage third-party add-ons, such as AP automation tools, to enhance platform functionality.
* Make data products accessible on the existing data platform, supporting the Data Mesh strategy and architecture.
* Participate in incident and problem resolution processes to address technical issues promptly.
* Collaborate with the team to maintain optimal performance of Dynamics 365, ensuring both technical and functional alignment with business requirements.


**What We Are Looking For**
* Proficiency in X++ and SQL, with expertise in developing for Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain Management.
* Expertise in integration strategies and associated frameworks.


**Nice to have**
* Experience with Azure DevOps, Azure, and Power Platform.
* Understanding of automated solutions and experience leveraging automation technologies for improved productivity.
* Experience from developing and/or maintaining solutions based on PowerBI and Fabric.


**What is in it for you?**
* Gain hands-on experience in a fast-growing scale-up, with a supportive and inclusive culture, and career advancement opportunities.
* Collaborate with diverse teams across international markets and launch products globally.
* Develop and grow personally and professionally in an entrepreneurial-minded environment.
* Thrive in a dynamic, solution-oriented culture, tackling challenges and driving meaningful solutions that make a positive impact on the world.
* Influence the company's success, with a visible impact on product development and market growth.
* Enjoy the flexibility of our hybrid work model and discover our brand-new office at Norra Stationsgatan 93 in Stockholm. Conveniently located near public transport, with Sankt Eriksplan and Odenplan stations just a few minutes walk away.


 At Aira, we champion next-generation energy as well as diversity and inclusion. We firmly believe that a diverse workforce fosters innovation and creativity, enhancing our ability to serve customers and communities effectively. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, cultures and perspectives to join our team. Our commitment is to uphold equality and inclusivity, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to a better future for our people and the planet.

title: Senior Enterprise Agile Coach
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 CGI är en global leverantör som levererar högkvalitativ affärsrådgivning, systemintegration och outsourcing tjänster. Vi arbetar sida vid sida med kunder för att omvandla innovation, data och teknik till framgång för dem.
   

  

 Drivs du likt oss av att ligga i digitaliseringens framkant? Vill du dessutom använda denna drivkraft i en konsultroll och hjälpa våra kunder att bättre ta vara på digitaliseringens möjligheter? Vi söker nu en Senior Agile Coach till vårt Financial Services team med spetskompetens och certifiering inom SAFe!
   

  

 Hos oss kommer du att få arbeta med några av de främsta kunderna och skarpaste kollegorna i Sverige. Vi värdesätter personligt engagemang som skapar gemenskap hos CGI. Vi jobbar nära kunderna och är alltid intresserade av att utveckla och förnya våra tjänster efter deras önskemål och dina förslag. Arbetsmiljön är ständigt i rörelse och du kommer känna att du jobbar hos en stor global arbetsgivare.
   

  

 Sök till oss redan i dag!
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Som Senior Agile Coach kommer du arbeta i uppdrag nära verksamheten med fokus på lean agile transformation, digitalisering och strategisk IT. Du kommer bland annat coacha våra kunder och våra egna leveranser i att driva det agila arbetet framåt, medverka i förändringsarbete och facilitera workshops, seminarier och utbildningar hos våra kunder och våra egna leveransteam.
   

  

 Som en del av SAFe-grupperingen kommer du leda certifieringskurser och delta och stötta i affärsutvecklingen av våra agila erbjudanden. Inom CGI FSRU finns även möjligheten att arbeta med bids, RFI/RFP och framtagande av nya produkter, tjänster och försäljning.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* dokumenterad praktisk erfarenhet som Agile Coach, Agile Team Coach, Scrum Master, Release Train Engineer
* SAFe SPC och/eller RTE certifiering
* kompletterande certifieringar och utbildningar inom t.ex. Lean, DevOps, Scrum, ICAgile
* förmågan att förmedla idéer och lösningar på ett pedagogiskt vis


 Du behärskar både svenska och engelska flytande, både muntligt och i skrift.
   

  

 Erfarenheter inom LeSS, Scrum @ Scale och andra ramverk är meriterande. Du kan ha medverkat inom ledningsgrupper som lean agile center of excellence eller varit delaktig i ledningen av större transformationer. Du gillar att arbeta som coach, instruktör, mentor och inspiratör, sätter kunden i fokus och hjälper dina agila team nå affärsmål med glädje och energi.
   

  

 En hälsosam kombination mellan arbete, familj och fritid är viktig för oss för att alla ska trivas och må bra. Det bidrar också till att vi skapar förtroende mellan varandra som tillsammans gör att alla vill och orkar prestera fokuserat, samtidigt som vi givetvis ska ha roligt.
   

  

**Vill du veta mer?**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig! Ansökningarna kommer hanteras löpande så ansök gärna så snart som möjligt. Har du några frågor så går det bra att kontakta rekryterande konsultchef Carl Larson på mail: carl.larsson@cgi.com.
   

  

 Resor och placering kan variera beroende på uppdrag. Personliga säkerhetskrav kommer att krävas om rollen kräver det.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Vad kan vi på CGI erbjuda dig?**
 CGIs kombination av global och lokal närvaro, med kontor på 30 orter i Sverige, ger nöjda kunder men innebär även att du som anställd alltid har ett kontor nära dig. Detta i kombination med flexibla arbetstider ger dig möjlighet till balans mellan privatliv och arbete, oavsett var i livet just du befinner dig.
   

  

 På CGI finns även stora möjligheter till interna karriärvägar där du kan välja att bli specialist eller bredda dig inom nya områden. Via våra interna nätverk, projekt och åtaganden i globala och nationella industrier, erbjuder vi dig kompetensutveckling och engagerade ledare som stöttar just dig i din utveckling.
   

  

 Mer information om våra förmåner:
   

  

* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Trygg anställning: Våra konsulter anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.


**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Power BI and Analytics Specialist
description:
**We are seeking a skilled Power BI Data Analyst to support our organization in developing tools and dashboards for data visualization and reporting.**


### **Assignment Description**


* Design and implement interactive Power BI dashboards and reports tailored to business needs.
* Extract, transform, and analyze data from various sources.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into actionable insights.
* Ensure scalability, usability, and performance optimization of Power BI solutions.
* Provide training or documentation to enable internal teams to use Power BI efficiently.

  


**Requirements**


* Bachelor’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Business Intelligence, or a related field.
* Certifications in Power BI or similar data visualization tools are highly desirable.
* Proficiency in Swedish and English, both written and spoken.
* Experience with DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) and Power Query (M) is required.
* Familiarity with programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL is a plus.

  


**Desired Skills**


* Previous experience as a Data Analyst or similar role focusing on Power BI development.
* Knowledge of advanced analytics, predictive modeling, or machine learning integration with Power BI.
* Experience in working with cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS.
* Strong understanding of database systems and ETL processes.
* Familiarity with business processes and KPIs.

title: VMware-expert
description:
Vill du jobba i en komplex miljö med en samhällsviktig funktion som ligger i teknikens framkant? Här finns stora möjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas både på djupet och bredden inom ett eller flera områden. Vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsplats med stor flexibilitet i vårt arbetssätt.


Skatteverket går in i en ny fas av uppbyggnad och innovation då vi kommer att stärka vår leverans av it-tjänster till fler statliga myndigheter. Därför bygger vi upp en ny enhet med en bred palett av kompetenser. Var med och gör samhället möjligt!

**Om jobbet**  

Skatteverkets kultur kännetecknas av ett agilt arbetssätt med högt i tak och en öppen dialog för förändring och utveckling. Du blir en del av enheten Skatteverkets tekniska tjänster (STT) med cirka 500 medarbetare. Vi ansvarar för utveckling, underhåll och drift och levererar tjänster inom IT infrastruktur och plattformar till flera myndigheter, Skatteverket, Kronofogden, Valmyndigheten samt Myndigheten för Digital förvaltning. Du kommer att tillhöra ett agilt team, där varje person har en expertkunskap inom VMware.


Vår IT Infrastruktur bygger på VMware och vi vill nu förstärka vårt team med ytterligare en VMwareexpert inom området. I rollen som expert på VMware produktportfölj blir du en nyckelspelare på Skatteverkets IT-avdelning. Du tillhör STT sektion för Server, virtualisering och lagring som utvecklar och underhåller Skatteverkets IaaS plattform. Dina arbetsuppgifter som VMware-expert innebär att du arbetar med utveckling och underhåll av Skatteverkets VMware infrastruktur tillsammans med dina kollegor inom ditt team. Du kommer även att arbeta med vår Aria Operations plattform. Du kommer att ha placeringsort på något av våra IT-kontor.


Just nu bygger vi nästa generation av plattformen, där vi ytterligare ska öka automatiseringen och vidareutveckla vår privata molnlösning för att hantera fler kunder.


Vi erbjuder mycket goda semestervillkor samt goda tjänstepensionsvillkor och förmåner för dig som är förälder. Vi är en stor IT-avdelning som erbjuder dig utvecklingsmöjligheter både på djupet och på bredden. Du kommer att få möjlighet till en flexibel arbetstid och en hybrid arbetsplats, det är en självklarhet för oss att du har balans mellan arbete och fritid. Tillsammans arbetar vi med framtidens tekniklösningar!


Här kan du läsa mer om hur det är att jobba med IT hos oss och ta del av vad några av våra medarbetare berättar om sina jobb: Jobba med IT hos oss

**Om dig**  

För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. I arbetet är gott omdöme och förståelse för rättssäkerhet och säkerhet viktigt. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.


I det här jobbet ska du:

* ha god samarbetsförmåga, vara hjälpsam och ha ett gott bemötande
* förstå vikten av att skapa relationer med andra team för att nå de uppsatta målen
* ha förmågan och viljan att lära dig nya saker och kunna ställa om vid förändringar
* agera medvetet och professionellt utifrån en god självinsikt
* kunna analysera informationsflöden, se samband, mönster och göra avgränsningar
* uttrycka dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.


 Du ska även ha:

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av VMware produktportfölj och en vilja att utvecklas ytterligare inom teknikområdet


Det är önskvärt att du har kunskap om en eller flera av följande, vRO, vRA, Advanced Loadbalancer, Cloud Foundation, vSphere, VMware Aria operations (vrops). Det är även önskvärt att du har arbetat med agila metoder.

**Bra att veta**  

Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.


En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.


På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.


När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.


Välkommen med din ansökan!


Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg, Umeå, Malmö, Göteborg | Län: Ospecificerad arbetsort | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/415 | Kontakt: Jens Nedstam, Sektionschef jens.nedstam@skatteverket.se, Therese Schönbeck, HR-specialist therese.schonbeck@skatteverket.se, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2024-12-11 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-12-17

title: Integrations Architect
description:
*Vill du designa och implementera framtidens integrationslösningar? På Innofactor söker vi dig som har erfarenhet av både on-*premise och molnbaserade miljöer, med ett extra fokus på Azure. Är du redo att ta nästa steg och bidra till spännande transformationsprojekt och tekniska lösningar i framkant?


**Om rollen**
  

Som Integrations Architect hos oss på Innofactor kommer du att spela en central roll i våra integrationsprojekt. Du ansvarar för att designa och implementera moderna molnbaserade miljöer och integrationslösningar inom i Azure Enterprise Integration Platform. Du kommer att få arbeta i en spännande dialog med våra kunder där du har ett stort ansvar att både kunna förklara effekter och affärsnytta utöver tekniken.


Att arbeta som konsult hos oss innebär variation, utveckling och möjlighet att göra skillnad. Du får möjlighet att bredda din kompetens genom spännande uppdrag i olika branscher och du får arbeta nära kunder med stöd av ett engagerat team. Som konsult hos Innofactor står din personliga och professionella utveckling alltid i fokus.


**Du kommer att:**


* Driva transformationsprojekt från t.ex BizTalk och säkerställa att lösningarna är robusta, säkra och verksamhetsanpassade.
* Hantera tekniska avvägningar mellan pro-code och low-code lösningar, med särskilt fokus på Azure.
* Samarbeta med verksamheten för att leverera lösningar som är skalbara och hållbara på lång sikt.
* Arbeta med Azure Enterprise Integration Platform och teknologier som Azure Functions och Logic Apps


Det här är en roll för dig som älskar att kombinera teknik och problemlösning och vill vara med och forma hur företag skapar och hanterar integrationer.


**Vem vi söker**
  

Vi letar efter dig som har en stark teknisk grund och erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer i både on-premise och molnbaserade miljöer.


Vi ser gärna att du har:


* Gedigen erfarenhet av utveckling inom C# och .NET.
* Erfarenhet av att bygga Azure Functions och flöden i Logic Apps
* God kunskap inom Azure som infrastrukturplatform
* Erfarenhet av integrationer och transformation från äldre system såsom t.ex BizTalk
* Meriterande med erfarenhet av Python och/eller PowerShell.

För den här rollen är det viktigt att du känner dig bekväm med att arbeta på både svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


**Om Innofactor**
  

På Innofactor Norden arbetar nästan 600 engagerade och professionella experter i Sverige, Norge, Finland och Danmark. Det som förenar oss är vårt intresse för innovation och den senaste tekniken.


I Sverige är vi cirka 70 anställda med kontor i centralt i Stockholm samt Göteborg och Malmö. Vi har konsulter som jobbar med Dynamics 365, Power Platform, Cloud, infrastruktur, dataanalytics och AI, cybersäkerhet, Microsoft 365, Azure med mera. Vi är också mycket stolta över våra helt egna produkter. Vi har Sveriges ledande medlemssystem för fackligt anslutna och ett ärendehanteringssystem som är störst inom offentlig sektor i Finland och nu på väg att ta den svenska marknaden med storm.


**Be the real you!**  

Vi är stolta över det vi skapar och låter våra medarbetare utvecklas som personer samtidigt som vi levererar högsta möjliga kvalitet till våra kunder. Vår arbetsmiljö stödjer de anställdas personliga utveckling och lärande, en god balans mellan arbete och privatliv.


På Innofactor kan du vara dig själv! Vi förväntar oss inte att alla ska vara likadana, utan behandlar varje Innofactorian som en individ. Vi vet att unika människor är avgörande för att skapa starka, framgångsrika team. Hos oss får du möjlighet att träffa människor från olika team, enheter och länder för att jobba med gemensamma projekt och delta i utbildningar.


**Välkommen med din ansökan till Innofactor!**

title: Product Owner SAP S/4 Cloud - Plan to Manufacture
description:
For 335 years, Husqvarna Group have shaped great experiences for those who care about the world around them.
It's a legacy we treasure, but our journey has only just begun. With that said, welcome to one of the world’s oldest start-ups! With our passion for innovation, we create new solutions - to enhance urban and green spaces, used and loved by many.
Here, you will be a part of the Team responsible for the SAP S/4 Cloud Solution Operations, dedicated to various steady state operations functions. Together, we focus on maintaining solution stability, security and performance after implementation, driving continuous improvement and operational excellence within our SAP Cloud Solution.
About the role:
Here, you’ll be at the forefront of technological advancements with SAP S/4 Cloud, where you'll be a part of a great journey, setting new industry standards. You'll have the opportunity to drive meaningful business transformation and optimize processes, making a real difference.
We’re seeking one experienced Product Owner in Plan to Manufacture, within our new SAP S/4 Cloud Solution.
The Product Owner acts as a pivotal liaison among Business Units, System Integrators, and IT, ensuring seamless integration and alignment of business processes with SAP S/4 Cloud capabilities. This role demands a proactive and knowledgeable individual who will drive the solution topics within their respective track.
Your responsibilities:* Define and maintain the product vision and roadmap for Plan to Manufacture.
* Act as the primary point of contact between internal stakeholders, system integrators, and the IT department.
* Guide and collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the SAP S/4 Cloud Solution meets business requirements.
* Prioritize product backlog items and coordinate with technical teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
* Monitor project progress, anticipate potential challenges, and adjust plans as necessary to meet objectives.
* Facilitate training and change management activities to ensure smooth adoption of new processes.
* Provide expert guidance on SAP S/4 Cloud capabilities and best practices within the specified track.


About you:
You have a minimum of 10 years in ERP system implementation, with at least 3-5 years as a Product Owner *or* in a leadership role managing SAP solutions. A Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Systems, or a related field is *required*, with a Master’s degree being *advantageous*. Also got a SAP S/4 Cloud certification or relevant training? *That’s a plus!*
Also, you have a deep understanding of your specific functional track; Plan to Manufacture.
Strong leadership skills and the ability to manage multiple stakeholders and complex project timelines are essential. Excellent communication, negotiation and presentation skills are also required, along with proficiency in Agile methodologies.
Location:
Preferred locations for this position is in Sweden (Huskvarna, Stockholm, Jonsered or Malmö).
But, with our hybrid working environment, you'll have the flexibility to work both onsite and remotely, promoting work-life balance for all team members. We like to meet in *the office at least 2 days a week.*
Your application:
Join us and be a part of shaping the future of business processes with SAP S/4 Cloud! Apply as soon as possible but no later than 2025-01-06. We apply ongoing selection.
If you have any questions regarding the recruitment process please contact Global Talent Acquisition Partner: Matilda Nordén – matilda.norden@husqvarnagroup.com.*About Husqvarna Group:*  

  

*Husqvarna Group is the world’s largest producer of outdoor power products including robotic lawn mowers, garden tractors, chainsaws and trimmers. The Group is also the European leader in consumer watering products and one of the world leaders in cutting equipment and diamond tools for the construction and stone industries. The Group’s products and solutions are sold via dealers and retailers to both consumers and professional users in more than 100 countries. The head office is located in Stockholm, Sweden, and the share is listed on NASDAQ OMX Stockholm Exchange*.
Last date to apply:
06 January 2025

title: Data Analyst
description:
Data Analyst


**Main duties:**


As a Data Analyst consultant, you are a critical factor when we take data-driven work to new levels and across the entire company. As a Data Analyst consultant, you will have the opportunity to work with one of Sweden's largest databases and develop in analytical methods and data visualization together with skilled, like-minded colleagues. You will learn a lot about the grocery industry and get to be involved in developing a data-driven way of working in a large, innovative company in change.

  


As a Data Analyst consultant at Data & Analytics, you will work with the entire value chain in analytics – everything from defining needs, collecting, processing and modeling data to communicating and visualizing the results. Right now, we're on a journey to the cloud, GCP, and need to strengthen our team to accelerate that journey. In addition to the above, we want you to be involved and share your knowledge in the team and also contribute to even better working methods within the guild.


**Shell requirements:**


* We see that you have experience of and are confident in developing in SQL and DBT. We see that you have experience with Tableau or similar visualization tools. That's a plus if you have experience with GCP, GitHub, BigQuery, Looker Studio, and Connected Sheets.
* At least 5 years of relevant experience
* Both Swedish and English unhindered

  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : GCP, SQL, Table, DBA

title: Product Owner SIL
description:
**Imagine the mobility of tomorrow**
------------------------------------

  

  

Picture yourself in an exciting industry where the future revolves around leading-edge electrified and self-driving cars seamlessly integrated into people's daily lives. But how can we create this future in a way that is both safe and sustainable? This is just one of the inspiring questions we're working to solve here at Volvo Cars. Join us and watch your ideas shape the future of mobility.

  


**About us**
------------


**We are revolutionizing the automotive industry with the fastest Software Factory**


At Volvo Cars Engineering (R&D), we’re empowering developers with unified, enhanced tools and streamlined workflows to drive continuous improvement.


Our **Software-in-the-Loop (SIL)** initiative aims to:


* Ensure consistently reliable software products
* Accelerate integration testing by identifying issues early—without reliance on physical hardware
* Minimize testing and deployment times through fast, scalable virtual testing
* Enable rapid evaluations and accelerated progress in early phases and concept evaluations


By automating and speeding up testing, we ensure immediate feedback to developers while delivering exceptional vehicles to our customers


**What you'll do**
------------------



As Product Owner, you will:


* Lead and coach a high-performing team while being hands-on with development of the solution
* Define and execute a roadmap for a trusted, always-working SIL solution already in production
* Explore innovative ways to evolve SIL and take it to the next level
* Drive developer experience improvements to ensure the adoption of new ways of working
* Balance strategic decision-making with operational execution to deliver value at scale


This role goes beyond managing JIRA backlogs and PowerPoint presentations—it’s about creating an impactful SIL ecosystem that speaks to developers through reliable results, robust tools, and exceptional performance.


**What you'll bring**
---------------------


**Required skills and experience:**


* M.Sc. or B.Sc. within Software Engineering, Electrical/Embedded Systems, Electronics, Physics, Mechatronics, or similar
* Proven expertise in leading and developing Software-in-the-Loop solutions for developing and testing large-scale, complex systems
* Deep knowledge and hands-on experience in software development and engineering practices
* Programming proficiency in Python, C++, or similar languages.


**Valuable skills and experience:**


While not mandatory, the following skills and experiences can set you apart and help you excel in this role:


* Expertise in cloud infrastructure (e.g., AWS).
* Proficiency with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Zuul, Jenkins).
* Familiarity with SIL and simulation standards.
* Experience with SIL and Virtual ECU tools used in the automotive industry (e.g., Silver, emulators).
* Knowledge of HIL tools (e.g., dSPACE, Vector).
* Proficiency in Linux and POSIX environments.
* Understanding of automotive operating systems, standards, and protocols (e.g., QNX, AUTOSAR, CAN, LIN, Flexray, Ethernet, SOME/IP).
* Experience with CAE, simulations, and modeling.



**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
---------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English.

  

  

Once your application is successfully submitted, you’ll receive a confirmation email. Applications are open until 10th of JAN 2024. We’re excited to get to know you!

  



**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
-----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.  

  

And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!


Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more


Curious about our story? Read more
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: ServiceNow Consultant
description:
The Senior ServiceNow/ITSM Consultant will be responsible for the successful implementation and customization of the ServiceNow platform for prestigious enterprise customers.  


**Main responsibilities and challenges:**
* Implement solutions for enterprise customers based on the ServiceNow platform covering the following IT and business domains: ITSM, ITOM (Event management, Discovery, Cloud management), HR service delivery, Project management incl. Agile development, Financial management incl. Cost management, GRC, Security Operations, Customer service management, Field service management, various business service management areas, e.g. marketing, legal, facilities, etc., and last but not least, development of custom applications aiming to automate whatever business process or agendas.


* Be involved in various project roles: business analyst, solution architect, technical consultant.


* Prepare business proposals, analyze customer requirements, improve processes and develop technical solutions.


* A substantial part of responsibilities includes technical activities such as coding, customizing and tuning the ServiceNow platform, and integrating with external systems.


* Communicate with the customers.


* Provide guidance to our customers and enable them to implement the best solutions.


* Presales presentations and workshops.

  


**Your profile should look like this:*** Previous ServiceNow experience and certification.


* Proven practical experience with object-oriented programming.


* Knowledge of Web technologies and tools.


* Knowledge of IT Service Management and ITIL.


* Fluency in Swedish and English is required.

  


**What would be an advantage:*** Experience with other IT Service Management Tool.


* ITIL certification.

  


**Why join GuideVision:*** Interesting job for the Elite ServiceNow Partner and Leading Partner in the CEE region.


* Career growth program.


* Pleasant and informal working environment.


* Technical and Soft-skill Trainings, workshops, and certifications.

  


**Sounds like a great opportunity? We look forward to hearing from you.**
